rental.headline: Stylish near new one bedroom apartment !
rental.description:
This stylish near new apartment is sure to give you the convenient, laid back lifestyle you desire.
Located in the complex you are only a short stroll from the Tuggeranong Town Centre, an easy drive to Woden and the bus interchange is just minutes from your door. The apartment features a generous bedroom with built in robes, stylish bathroom and open plan kitchen with quality stainless steel Fisher & Paykel appliances and island bench with stone bench tops. The huge living area opens onto the sunny balcony which is ideal for sitting back and relaxing as you enjoy the views over Tuggeranong lake.
Reverse cycle air conditioning is perfect for the coming summer months and there is secure parking for your car.

rental.headline: Perfect pet friendly home!
rental.description:
Recently renovated from top to bottom this stunning three bedroom home is perfect for anyone wanting a modern, contemporary home with an enormous backyard that allows pets.
Boasting a brand new kitchen with gas cooktop, plenty of storage and preparation space plus a meals area off to the side.
The sunny formal lounge has fresh new carpets and lovely leafy outlook. There are three good sized bedrooms as well as a renovated modern bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, separate toilet and laundry.
The easy care gardens are the idea place to relax over the warm summer months with friends and your furry family members.
New kitchen Gas cooking New carpet New paint Large backyard Pet friendly Double garage Ducted heating

rental.headline: REDUCED TO $500-520
rental.description:
RENT: $500 PER WEEK
This lovely home is set amongst a mature garden within walking distance to schools, shops and parks. The home offers four large bedrooms, separate living areas, mature gardens, secure yard and large entertaining area.
Property features: Set in sought after suburb of Hughes 4 bedrooms Separate living and dining areas Double garage Large secure backyard Covered entertaining area Dishwasher Gas heating Within minutes walk to Hughes primary school and pre-school, public transport, Canberra Hospital shops and Woden Town Centre
We are currently taking expressions of interest; please contact our office on 6253 3333 or kr@rutherfordjohnston.com

rental.headline: Views forever.....in the heart of Belconnen town centre
rental.description:
This simply gorgeous upper floor apartment in the heart of Belconnen's town centre offers an executive lifestyle with encompassing views over Lake Ginninderra and surrounds to match.
The spacious three bedroom ensuite apartment also features a large north-facing balcony (approx. 24m2) that extends your living outdoors and provides the perfect lake-viewing platform.
Inside, the generous lounge and dining areas are light and airy and offer plenty of room for your lifestyle activities.
The fully-equipped kitchen opens to the living areas and has views to cook by. All the bedrooms are generous and fitted with built-in-wardrobes. The segregated main bedroom, with large ensuite, also opens to the balcony and offers lake views. The main bathroom, with spa bath, incorporates a European-style laundry with tumble dryer and the 6-star EER rating ensures the apartment is comfortable all year round. New carpet has just been laid throughout.
Moments from an array of amenities such as University of Canberra, the AIS, Calvary Hospital, Westfield Belconnen, CISAC, public service departments, cafes, restaurants and more. There is garaging for two cars, secured in a lockable cage and a second secure storage cupboard. Netanya's facilities back up the executive, urban lifestyle this apartment suggests. There are both indoor and outdoor swimming pools, a gym, sauna, squash and tennis courts. You can see your lakeside jogging route as you pull on your running shoes in the morning!
Available now for a 6 or 12 month lease.

rental.headline: The Complete Package.
rental.description:
This unit is ideally located at end of the complex giving you a lovely quiet location.
As you walked into the unit you will be greeted with an enormous open plan living area that extends out to a private sunlit balcony.
The kitchen offers ample cupboard and bench space along with a breakfast bar
There is an ensuite to the main bedroom, there are build-in-wardrobes and access to the second balcony from both bedrooms.
Enjoy the convince of a swimming pool, tennis court, games room and BBQ area right at your door step.
Car accommodation is 2 secure underground car spaces, for an added bonus there is a storage area for your use.
Available from the 3rd October 2013 for a 12 month lease. Contact me today to organise a viewing time that suits you on 6253 2499 or via email kross@bel.peterblackshaw.com.au

rental.headline: Aranda at its best...........
rental.description:
Situated in the ever sought after suburb of Aranda, this stylish modern duplex sits peacefully to the rear of the block.
From the moment you walk through the front door you know this home is something special, with its high ceilings, beautiful polished timber floors to the amazing built in floor to ceiling library in the front formal sitting room. This same room has stunning floor to ceiling windows that exudes sunlight. The perfect place to snuggle up with a good book.
The master bedroom is to the front of the property with a walk through wardrobe into the modern ensuite bathroom.
Venture up a few stairs which brings you into the enormous open plan living area, with the modern kitchen which is fully equipped with high quality stainless steel Bosch appliances - gas stove and electric oven and dishwasher. Large kitchen benches and loads of storage will please anyone that does the cooking.
This area combines a large dining area, and equally large family room with bi-fold doors which open out on to a lovely courtyard with a deck and a small easy care garden to entertain or play. The other 2 bedrooms are good size rooms with both of them offering mirrored built-in-robes. At this end of the house is the modern main bathroom which offers quality fittings with a large corner spa bath, separate shower and toilet.
The large double garage has a remote controlled panel door for your convenience and also lots of storage areas. There is internal access to the home via stairs, the laundry is also at this level and is equipped with a clothes dryer. For your all year comfort the house is fitted with ducted reverse cycle heating and cooling. Property is wired for phone/internet through Transact. You will find it hard to find anything that beats this beautiful property.
No pets will be considered at this property. 12 month lease sought.

rental.headline: Perfect inner city lifestyle
rental.description:
Perfectly located right on the edge of the City, this stunning ground floor one bedroom apartment is perfect for those wanting to be close to the heart of the city as well as being able to relax in the parkland directly opposite.
Featuring an open plan kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances, and a spacious lounge and dining room perfect for sitting back and relaxing after a long day or entertaining friends.
The sunny bedroom has a walk in wardrobe and sliding doors out to the courtyard, as well as a two way bathroom and laundry.
There is also reverse-cycle air conditioning to keep you cool over the warm summer months, basement parking with additional storage & an intercom system. Offered for a six month lease.

rental.headline: Beautiful as new home!
rental.description: Nestled at the end of this 2 year old complex is this wonderful spacious townhouse. Due to its position in the complex you get to enjoy a large rear and side garden that already has a lovely lawn growing. The open plan living areas are sunny and bright with a gas wall furnace for your comfort. The beautiful equipped kitchen has all the modern conveniences that any gourmet chef would enjoy including ample cupboards and bench space. Stainless steel appliances are fitted with a Fisher & Paykel gas stove top, electric fan forced oven and dishwasher. A large hallway cupboard gives you more storage facilities and this hallway flows through to the oversized bedrooms. The master bedroom has been fitted with a triple built-in-mirrored wardrobe and the second bedroom is roomy with a built-in-wardrobe also. If soaking in a bath with candles and a glass of wine is your thing, then the bathroom will delight you. With its lovely deep bath you may never leave this room! A separate toilet and laundry make this home a perfect package. Gorgeous new roman blinds will be fitted to all the windows shortly.Your car is also cared for in the secure single lock-up garage with internal access. 12 month lease preferred, no pets considered for this complex.

rental.headline: Excellent townhouse
rental.description:
Beautifully maintained 3 bedroom ensuite townhouse in a conveniently located complex.
Enter into the lower level which offers an open plan kitchen and dining area, which is spacious enough for a study nook also. Your kitchen offers electric cooking and enjoys the convenience of a dishwasher, ample bench space and cupboards for storage.
Featuring a stunning slow combustion wood fire make this a lovely room to want to occupy.
The second bedroom with large built-in-robes and the main bathroom features the most amazing claw-foot bath and brass fittings. Just stunning! The laundry completes this level. On the upper level is the lounge room opens out with large sliding doors onto the lovely easy care paved courtyard garden, complete with covered patio.
The master bedroom is equipped with a built-in-robe and an equally charming ensuite.
To the other end of the house is the 3rd bedroom which enjoys a sunny aspect.
In all a perfect townhouse!

rental.headline: Tri level Townhouse
rental.description:
This spacious tri-level town house is set only moments from the Hospital, Woden Town centre and only a short drive from the Parliamentary triangle, City and Tuggeranong.
Featuring a light and bright open plan kitchen that overlooks the living and dining room which would make the perfect place to entertain friends or simply relax.
Upstairs are two good sized bedrooms with built in robes and the main bathroom and laundry with dryer.
On the ground floor there is internal access to the garage and generous entry with high ceilings. Two bedrooms Built in robes Open plan kitchen Living and dining room Main bathroom with bathtub Laundry with Dryer and washing machine Garage Close proximity to Woden and the hospital.

residential.headline: Bruce's Best Catch
residential.description:
Nestled amongst house proud owners on a quiet loop street this eye-catching residence offers the perfect location for families looking for that unique family home. Perfect for every season it has been architecturally designed to capture the northern sun with oversized windows running along the entire northern edge to keep you warm during those cold winter days and surrounded by parkland for you to enjoy in summer.
Stepping inside there is a sense of space that is created by the enormous six metre high ceiling in the entry and living room. This delightful sun-drenched area is the perfect place for family nights and relaxing on weekends. Perfectly sited next to the kitchen sits the dining room, this long area connects with the living room and flows seamlessly through to the kitchen and family room.
The imposing galley style kitchen is every home chef's dream with stylish two tone cupboards, huge 900mm Smeg oven and a six burner gas stove top. Make the most of the huge north facing windows that look out to the parkland as you enjoy Sunday brunch at the elegant waterfall island bench that is wrapped in Caesar stone. With an adjoining family room this is the ideal place for the children to play while you cook dinner or for casual drinks in the summer as it flows out to the entertaining area and garden.
Outdoors will cater for every member of the family with a massive entertaining area for mum and dad and a grassed lawn area and veggie patch for the kids. If you are looking for some extra room to run and play you can enjoy the adjacent parkland and children's playground which is just a short stroll away.
Back inside there are four well appointed bedrooms. Downstairs is the master with ensuite, bedrooms two and three that could also make the ideal study or home theatre room, main bathroom with spa bath, powder room and generous laundry with Caesar stone bench tops. The additional fourth bedroom is located upstairs with windows overlooking the living and dining as well as the light and airy rumpus room.
Features: Architecturally designed north facing four bedroom ensuite home Light and bright 2.7m ceilings open 6m high void in the entry Gourmet kitchen with Caesar stone bench top Island bench Quality stainless steel Smeg appliances including a 900mm oven and 6 burner gas stove top Fisher & Paykel dishwasher Floor to ceiling porcelain tiles in the bathroom, ensuite Spacious bathroom with spa bath Designer Grohe tapware throughout Freshly painted inside & out with industrial style cladding to the upper level exterior Covered entertaining area, lawn area A veggie garden Backing and siding open parkland Only one neighbor Ducted gas heating Reverse-cycle air-conditioning in the family room Instant continuous hot water Plenty of internal storage Double garage with internal access Storage cupboards Highly desirable location close to UC, Radford College, Calvary Hospital and Belconnen Town Centre

residential.headline: First Class Living
residential.description:
REDUCED TO SELL - OWNERS DOWNSIZING
This exquisite home offers fine modern lines and carefully-honed edges with five-bedrooms and three-bathrooms. The craftsmanship and attention to detail are second to none.
Stepping through the front door opens up a world of opulence and style, from magnificent porcelain tiles and fascinating cut-outs through to soft neutral colours and an extraordinary floor plan that is both friendly and flexible.
A living room welcomes you on the right, with northern light streaming through windows to ensure maximum brightness and warmth, followed by an equally inviting island kitchen filled with Caesarstone benchtops, glass and stainless steel. The appliances include a Nobel double oven with matching microwave cavity, a Nobel dishwasher, Bosch hotplate and a rangehood, all superbly incorporated into the design to provide a functional, fashionable cooking area that overlooks the dining area and family room. There is even a large walk-in pantry, shelving for 40 wine bottles, a surplus of storage and a powder room.
The sleeping quarters line the entire left-hand side of the home, slightly raised so that they enjoy the same northern sunlight as the living areas. The master occupies a commanding position at the front, with wall to wall BIRs on two sides and an enormous ensuite alongside.
The home's main bathroom separates the master from three of the remaining bedrooms, each with a distinctive design and layout and all with extensive BIRs.
The huge laundry also occupies a space on the upper level, with immediate access outside to a raised drying area and vegetable garden. But its downstairs that you may find the biggest surprise, with a fully self-contained studio off the family room that provides numerous opportunities for family flexibility and personal freedom.
Decadently fitted with a full kitchen, including another Nobel oven, stove top and exhaust, the studio even comes complete with a beautifully-appointed bathroom, a multi-purpose room and a large games room, each behind separate doors.The double garage includes access to an enormous under-house storage area that's dry and easily navigated while, outside, you'll find an entertaining area that can accommodate a family-sized table, a BBQ and a waist-level brick enclosure that's currently used for spit-roasting.
With every imaginable inclusion such as ducted vacuum, ducted heating/cooling over two zones, a security facility and integrated sound system, a home where you'll want for nothing.
Sited opposite a new quality development, you will also be within easy reach of all of the area's attractions - sporting facilities, the AIS, Canberra Stadium, UC, Radford College, the Calvary Hospital and, of course, the shopping, restaurants and employment of Belconnen's CBD.

features.otherFeatures: formal lounge, modern bathroom, modern kitchen, separate dining room, bbq, close to schools

residential.headline: Entry Level to Aranda
residential.description:
Being a part of the tightly held Aranda community is a lifestyle that is highly desired and this original three bedroom home provides you with an exceptional opportunity to live in Aranda at an affordable price.
Sited on a large 689m2 block, surrounded by beautiful established gardens and siding the Aranda bushland. Nestled within easy reach of countless leisure activities, sporting facilities, universities, esteemed schools, Calvary Hospital and Jamison Centre and within minutes of the city and Belconnen, it's obvious why Aranda has gained a reputation as the suburban heart of Canberra and one of our most elite residential addresses.
Stepping inside you'll find a living room with a cosy fire place that leads you through to the separate dining room and a sun-filled kitchen with views out to the delightful front gardens.
Features include ducted gas heating and ducted cooling, air conditioning in living room, security system, automatic garage.
Outside the lush gardens are a haven were you can relax with friends and family, with a paved entertaining area and plenty of room for entertaining.
Land value: UV$410,000 Three bedrooms One bathroom Enclosed verandah Ducted heating Ducted cooling Gas fireplace Security system Automatic garage Established gardens Next to bushland Walk to Aranda School Close to Calvary Hospital Jamison Centre Minutes to Radford College, Belconnen Centre, the city

residential.headline: Keeping Up With Kinleyside
residential.description:
OWNERS NEED TO SELL - PRICE REDUCED
Set on a quiet loop street in a boutique development of only three, this beautifully-positioned free standing villa is bound to enrich your lifestyle in more ways than one.
Stepping inside you're welcomed with a well-proportioned, immaculately presented formal lounge and dining room. With its large windows this light, inviting room is versatile enough to cater for every occasion - from a bustling dinner party surrounded by friends to a carefree afternoon curled up with a good book.
Continuing through the home you'll discover the functional galley style kitchen that opens out to the spacious meals and family room. With its broad northerly aspect it's a space where the entire family can relax and unwind as well as being a safe and snug play area for the children as you prepare dinner.
Sited along the front of the home the generous master is tastefully decorated with warm, soothing tones and enjoys its own ensuite, multiple built-in robes and a lush leafy outlook. Bedrooms two and three are also set at the front of the home and offer ample storage space. The huge fourth bedroom with two built in robes is located overlooking the rear deck, offering endless possibilities as a lavish guest bedroom, home office or extra rumpus room for the kids. The renovated main bathroom is sleek and modern with a luxurious spa bath to ease the tension after a long day.
Opening through sliding doors off the kitchen and fourth bedroom the delightful low maintenance rear gardens and entertaining deck can be enjoyed all year round with a minimum of fuss.
Located only a short stroll from the Hawker shopping centre, and moments from local parkland and schools, this is your chance to enjoy a relaxed low maintenance lifestyle without having to compromise on space or price.
Boutique development of three Freestanding extra-large villa Formal lounge and dining room Spacious north facing meals and family room Galley style kitchen Four bedrooms Master with ensuite Huge fourth bedroom/rumpus Renovated bathroom with spa bath In floor heating to main bathroom Split system air-conditioner Solar hot water system Modern laundry Large entertaining deck Single carport Colorbond Fencing Body Corp Fees $1,357.69 pa (approx) Living size 162m2 (approx)

residential.description: This delightfully convenient two bedroom ensuite apartment is superbly located in the heart of Kippax and offers the ideal urban home for first home buyers and investors alike. Young executives will appreciate the benefit of having everything you need on your doorstep let alone the spacious open plan living area the apartment offers. There's a sunny balcony overlooking parkland, shaded by the trees in summer, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, kitchen, large bathroom, generous ensuite, new carpet, secure underground car park and storage.At this price, the light-filled unit offers buyers a wonderful chance to escape the rental treadmill. It also represents an astute investment opportunity with a current potential rental return of $360-$380 per week. residential.headline: Relax into a Retirement Lifestyle
residential.description: If you are ready to downsize from the family home and are looking for a comfortable, low-maintenance, two bedroom villa that offers an easy living lifestyle, then this delightful home in Ridgecrest Village may be perfect for you. Offering secure, private living in a freshly carpeted and painted home, the villa also has new window treatments and stove. You may also choose to enjoy the village facilities including a bowling green, craft room, billiard table, hairdressing salon and community lounge. Have peace of mind knowing there's a 24-hour emergency call system in place and you can break free from the lawn mower shackles! Here's the opportunity to leave that to others and enjoy your leisure time in the courtyard garden you create. The villa features sunny, open living/dining areas, a generously sized kitchen with dishwasher, new upright oven and plenty of bench and storage space. Both bedrooms have built-in wardrobes, the user-friendly bathroom has a separate toilet and there's a reverse cycle air conditioner. Outside, the Community Centre, facilities and visitor parking are conveniently nearby. There's a garden shed, storage and a carport. Close to Belconnen shopping centre, the walking trails and outdoor recreational facilities of Lake Ginninderra are nearby. You can walk or ride to the shopping mall for coffee with friends then catch the Village bus home, or go on holiday and have peace of mind knowing that everything will be looked after while you are away.Come and see what the Village has to offer. -Sunny lounge/dining room with sliding door access to garden.-Kitchen with new upright gas cooker and dishwasher. New flooring.-Garbage disposal unit, storage options.-Both bedrooms with built-in robes.-Ceiling fan in living area.-Ducted heating-RC/AC in bedroom.-Bathroom with walk-in shower & separate toilet.-Laundry with dryer-New carpet in living and bedrooms.-Awning blinds to rear windows. -Enclosed yard.-Carport, garden shed & storage.-Pets permitted -refer to Village guidelines.-Units Plan 406.-UV and Block size are for entire complex.

residential.headline: Wise Choice, Sound Value
residential.description: Come and see for yourselves why words can't describe the wow factors of this three bedroom home after a stunning contemporary transformation and stylish renovations. You won't need the wisdom of Solomon to appreciate the value of this home and its convenient location near schools, shops and transport. As soon as you enter you'll note the impressive interiors featuring newly installed contemporary flooring, a modern bathroom and kitchen as well as an open family layout that offers versatility and space for all ages. If these features aren't enough, then one inspection of the purpose-built study / entertainment unit (the centre piece of the house), is likely to convince every smart buyer!Full length windows enable an abundance of light to stream naturally into the kitchen and family areas which extend out from the meals area. Just outside is a pergola and back yard that's ideal for children, pets or even friends who just want to sit back and enjoy a fun filled Spring day. Three generously sized bedrooms, all complete with built in wardrobes, are situated separately down the hallway from the main living areas offering privacy without ever being out of touch with the homes family spaces. Your comfort inside is assured all year round with ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling while, outside, you'll appreciate stand-out surroundings and a great location. Little wonder it's on Solomon Crescent it's the wisest of choices. residential.headline: There's Nothing Complex About It
residential.description: Light, bright and deceptively spacious, this generously sized two bedroom ensuite townhouse represents a tempting alternative to apartment life with an extraordinary 92m2 of single-level living space and separate title ownership, all set in a tranquil cul-de-sac within a gorgeous little cluster of homes near parkland. Offering two sizable separate living areas and discretely private bedrooms, one with a WIR and other with a BIR, there's also a two way bathroom, a powder room and internal access to the single garage. Outside you can kick off your shoes and take advantage of two private, sun-filled courtyards, or simply walk to the end of the street and stroll along the green belt to the Melba Playing fields. Located close to schools and within easy reach of the lake or the employment and attractions of Belconnens CBD, it's a property that will suit a range of buyers in numerous stages of life. So whether you're starting out, slowing down or just looking for an investment that's likely to suit just about everybody, put this address high on your list for serious consideration. Life is complex enough already choose to live where you can leave your worries behind. Featuring:- Quiet location- Spacious living areas comparable to that of a house- Separate living areas- Lock up garage with internal access- Close to local amenities- Private atrium and rear courtyard

residential.headline: Open Plan Stunner
residential.description: You will be genuinely impressed by the outstanding quality of the renovations this 3 bedroom home has undergone for its fortunate owner. This will be one of those homes that offers you excellence from the moment you step inside.No longer will you need to settle for the compromise between a convenient location and a beautiful home. This architecturally renovated, single storey home on a 712m2 block, is ready for you to just move in, enjoy and brag about to your friends and family. The bright and functional open plan living area will make entertaining family and friends a pleasure. You will immediately be able to see yourself in this modern kitchen which flows effortlessly out onto the deck and covered entertaining area through ceiling to floor sliding glass doors. Boasting real, solid timber floor boards, bathed in sunlight, welcoming open plan living areas, neutral cool colours, large renovated kitchen and bathroom, reverse cycle air conditioning, built-in robes, carpet to all bedrooms and enough space in the enclosed backyard for the kids and family pet to run around is just the beginning of this home's description.With Cooleman Court, Westfield Woden, schools, hospital and clubs nearby, this home will greatly appeal to a wide range of buyers before Christmas this year. So if you are starting out, an investor, or looking to downsize, inspecting this property is a must!- Beautifully renovated interior.- Modern kitchen.- Gas cooktop.- Stone benchtops.- Island bench.- Functional open plan living area.- Timber floor boards. -Double Glazing on full height sliding glass doors and windows .- Built-ins to bedrooms.- Renovated bathroom.- Covered entertaining area.- Large backyard.- Convenient location.

residential.headline: COMFORT, CONVENIENCE AND CHARM
residential.description: This superb four bedroom ensuite home will delight buyers wanting a family home that's located within easy reach of the Belconnen Town Centre, Florey Shops and local schools, or any of the wide variety of facilities the nearby area has to offer.Offering a spacious floor plan with two internal living spaces, a segregated master, three generously-proportioned family bedrooms and a paved entertaining terrace at the rear of the property, it's a home where the comfortable layout and relaxed interior spaces are sure to leave you sleeping easy at night. Spread out into the abundance of space and still have ample room for family gatherings or dinner parties with friends.The large, level block is fully landscaped and designed to keep maintenance to a minimum, leaving your weekends free to unwind; there are numerous vegetable gardens, too, to supplement your pantry and let children experience the thrill of harvesting their own food, plus there's a chicken coop to raise the possibility of free range eggs on your breakfast table all year round. Factor in its extra-large double garage, a fourth toilet at the rear of the home and an external study or storage area, and it's a property that's bound to appeal to wide range of purchasers from families to home-based workers or from multi-generation clans to investors. Presenting this lovely three bedroom home featuring a lightfilled open plan lounge and dining room.

In this quiet and centrally located complex is this outstanding sunlight filled apartment that will be a standout property for the clever renters out there seeking quality living with an amazing locale ..

rental.headline: Beautiful townhouse located in a quiet suburb
rental.description:
Open plan living and dining room with stained timber flooring. Updated kitchen offers gas cooking, ample cupboard space and stainless steel appliances.
The two spacious bedrooms have built-in robes and views of the established gardens.
Soak up the luxury only a bath can give in this 70's retro style bathroom with separate shower.
Appreciate single lock-up garage with access to the laundry and rear courtyard.
Located close to the schools and shops. Short walking distance to the nearest bus stop.
****Available mid December****

rental.headline: Immaculate townhouse backing parkland
rental.description:
Set in a secluded cul de sac in a boutique development, this larger than average three bedroom ensuite town house is sure to enrich your lifestyle in more ways than one.
Stepping inside you're welcomed with neutral tones and a well-proportioned formal lounge and dining room. With its large sunny windows this inviting room is versatile enough to cater for every mood - from a crowded dinner party to a carefree afternoon curled up with a good book.
Continuing through the home you'll discover its open plan kitchen just off the dining area. It's a room where the entire family will feel welcomed as well as having a clear view out to the garden where the children to play as you prepare dinner.
Opening through sliding doors off the kitchen is the delightful low maintenance courtyard that's perfect for entertaining and opens through a secure gate to the spacious parkland and children's playground just meters from you back fence.
The second floor houses the three generous bedrooms and the home's main bathroom. The huge master is tastefully decorated and enjoys its own ensuite, triple mirrored built in robe and private balcony where you can relax with your partner or simply soak in the serenity. Bedrooms two and three are also a good size and have ample built in robes. The main bathroom is bright and attractive with a skylight and bath tub to ease the tension after a long day.
Other features include a single lockup garage with additional room for storage and internal access, a downstairs toilet with vanity, a spacious downstairs laundry and plenty of storage under the stairs.
Ideally located close to Gungahlin, beautiful open parklands and popular schools, it's a home that represents a fabulous opportunity for anyone wanting to be right in the heart of Amaroo while still retaining the luxury of a quiet community setting.
Features include: Open plan lounge and dining room Spacious kitchen with dishwasher, gas stove and breakfast bar Master with BIRs, ensuite & private balcony Two additional bedrooms with built in robes Separate laundry & under stair storage Downstairs toilet with vanity Sunny courtyard Rear access from the gardens to the park Single lock up garage with internal access and storage space Ducted heating & cooling
Pets and groups considered upon application
Available now

rental.headline: Lovely Townhouse
rental.description:
Tucked neatly on the cross of a T-shaped cul-de-sac in Page, this two bedroom townhouse offers functionality and comfort with the added convenience of local shops that are practically on your doorstep.
Beyond its under-cover carport and the enclosed, private front courtyard you'll find an interior that includes two generously sized segregated bedrooms with BIRs on the northern edge, backed by an open-plan living room and kitchen/meals area that leads out to an enclosed low-maintenance rear yard.
Single-level throughout, it would make a delightful choice for a range of applications from younger couples wanting their first taste of freedom away from home to older people needing good access to everyday shopping facilities and transport.
- Two bedroom - Private courtyard - Reverse cycle - Close to local shops, schools and Belconnen town centre.

rental.headline: Prestigious family home with stunning views
rental.description:
This elegant and spacious 4 bedroom home will draw you in from the moment you step foot in the door.
Offering spacious light filled living throughout both the casual and the formal living areas with a modern kitchen and dining area; complete of course with one of life's little luxuries A DISHWASHER!!
Up-stairs we find ourselves presented with not only 3 but 4 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes.
Not to mention, the main bedroom also boasts a walk through robe, ensuite and private balcony to sit back and enjoy the views.
And if all of that isn't enough, let's not forget about the beautiful undercover outdoor alfresco area and low maintenance enclosed back yard.
Don't miss out on the chance to make this beautiful house your home.
Features:
- Immaculately presented home - Four generous bedrooms, all with built-in wardrobes - Master with ensuite and private balcony with excellent views - Separate formal lounge room - Modern kitchen with dishwasher and gas cooktop - Separate laundry - Ducted gas heating and cooling - Corner spa bath in the main bathroom - Large covered alfresco entertaining area - Easy-care low maintenance gardens - Double garage with automatic door and internal access - Lovely views from the front - Quiet location

rental.headline: You can't go wrong at Cartwright
rental.description:
Nestled within Charnwood's "Silvergums" complex you'll find this charming three bedroom home that offers everything from a beautifully sun lit lounge room to a picturesque enclosed courtyard complete with uninterrupted privacy from the world around you.
Stepping inside this freshly painted home, you're immediately met with an overwhelming feeling of homeliness. With separate living, kitchen and dining area's ensuring that you're able to enjoy all the benefits of entertaining, no matter what the occasion may be.
And just in case you're worried about the sizzling heat in summer and Canberra's cold chill in winter - you'll be able to rest easy whilst experiencing year round comfort thanks to the well positioned reverse cycle air conditioning unit.
Two of the three well-appointed roomscome completewith built in robes, while the main bedroom also opens directly into the beautifully renovated bathroom, with the separate toilet conveniently located just outsideat the end of the hall.
And if you're not completely taken by the warmth and functionality this property has to offer, then its location is sure to catch you attention.
Conveniently located close to both public and private schools - all whilst being within meters of the local shopping district equipped with everything you could think of and more, from supermarkets to beauticians and take away to chemists.
Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience all the convenience and charm this property has to offer!!

residential.headline: Idyllic all-rounder
residential.description:
Urgent sale required as the owners are moving interstate.
Whether you're a first home buyer, a young family in search of a new life or an investor wanting to secure your portfolio with bricks & mortar, this delightfully appealing property is certain to offer something for everyone and everything for someone.
Its warming rich red facade and stepping stone path invites you into a lounge and dining room that's finished in neutral tones, temperature-controlled with reverse-cycle air-conditioning and kept light and bright by three large windows to let in the sun.
The ample kitchen offers plenty of bench space and storage, a gas cook top, stainless steel Euromaid oven and a serving window. Set in the heart of the home it's surrounded by a casual meals area that leads out to the back yard, as well as a tiled family room that offers enough space for a home office or study area where the children can do some pre-dinner homework.
The master bedroom is positioned at the front of the home, providing enough room for a king-sized bed and offering built in wardrobes plus access to the two way bathroom. The two remaining family bedrooms, both with BIRs, are set discreetly at the back of the home adjacent to the family room to allow a peaceful retreat for children or guests.
The deliberately low maintenance back garden features a huge double garage with extra storage plus a separate garden shed for all your gardening tools. There's a shaded area where pets can play or children can explore, as well as a covered pergola where parents can entertain or catch up on a well-earned afternoon nap.
The positioning is perfect for outdoor lovers too, only moments from the West Belconnen Pond where you can run or bike-ride for hours along dedicated tracks. The vast open greenery also lets you stroll along the Bicentennial National Track within metres of the State border as well as providing a variety of picnic tables and children's play areas for lazy Sundays.
Great for first-timers, couples, young couples or empty-nesters, and ideal for investors who love them all.
Currently tenanted until January 2014 at $420 per week.
Good sized lounge and dining room Modern open plan kitchen Casual meals and family room Three bedrooms with built in robes Two way bathroom with separate toilet Double lock up garage Garden shed Low maintenance front and back gardens Covered pergola area

residential.headline: Longing for longstaff
residential.description:
Set in a quiet leafy street, surrounded by large established trees sits this lovely three bedroom home.
Stepping inside you'll be welcomed with a sense of warmth and charm that is sure to please any family. The entry offers plenty of space for you to hang your coats and scarfs and has an additional storage cupboard as well.
The adjacent light filled living and dining room is a quiet oasis for you to relax and offers two separate sitting areas. The neutral tones and timber floor boards add to a natural ambience that's underlined with views to the garden through large windows.
The renovated kitchen just off the living room is the hub of the home and the ideal place to cook up a feast while you watch the children play. It is fitted with modern white cupboards, gas cooktop, dishwasher and has plenty of storage in the four-door pantry.
Set along the southern side of the home are the three light filled bedrooms, complete with built in robes and finished in neutral tones and beautiful polished timber floor boards.
To the rear of the home is the family bathroom complete with bathtub, separate toilet and spacious laundry.
The established rear garden has been thoughtfully designed to create a balance of grassed areas and garden beds. There are also established trees lining the fences, creating a private oasis for the children to play as you sit back and relax on the paved patio area.
Set in a quiet location within walking distance of schools and transport, and only minutes to the city, it's also just a short stroll to the popular Lyneham shops and restaurants.
Features include: Popular tree lined street Light and bright living and dining room Modern kitchen with gas cook top Timber floors throughout the living and bedrooms. Three bedrooms with built-in robes Updated bathroom with separate w/c Ducted gas heating Air conditioning in the master bedroom Security system Large double metal garage Established gardens and paved patio area Set in a quiet location close to all amenities Minutes to the city

features.otherFeatures: bath, close to schools, close to shops, close to transport, quiet location

residential.headline: TAKE A FRESH VUE ON LIFE
residential.description:
Quiet inner city locations don't get much better than this, with the gorgeous tree-lined surrounds of Macleay Street set deep in the heart of Turner, well back from local thoroughfares.
Behind your own secure entrance you'll find a spacious two bedroom, two bathroom unit constructed within the last few years, including a gourmet kitchen with Bosch appliances and Caesarstone bench tops, an internal European style laundry & dryer and reverse cycle air-conditioning.
But it's likely to be the twin covered balconies that will really have you swooning, with opportunities for quiet contemplation on one side and invigorating al fresco dining on the other. Alone or never alone - the lifestyle choice is yours - but when you factor in the top-floor views, the resident-only access to the manicured rear yard, the two designated spaces in the secure underground car park and the extraordinary floor space (72sqm internal and 24sqm balconies), you might find your list of friends has suddenly blossomed out of control. And with such easy access to the city, shopping, restaurants or the ANU, who could blame them?
This is a property that's bound to have wide appeal for a broad range of purchasers and tenants alike - from first-time buyers to visiting professionals and from city workers to university students.
Step up, lay back, chill out.

features.otherFeatures: balcony/patio/terrace, bath, lift, modern bathroom, modern kitchen, garden, level lawn

residential.headline: GORGEOUS FAMILY HOME IN PEACEFUL CUL-DE-SAC
residential.description:
Set back in one of the four extraordinary cul-de-sacs that dot the edge of Bacchus Circuit in private circles, number 70 presents a unique chance to enjoy a remarkably peaceful location alongside a green belt yet still retain the convenience of all the facilities across north Kambah, Woden and Tuggeranong.
Beyond its quiet street appeal and pleasant exterior you'll find yourself entering a world where comfort and functionality are built into the floor plan, starting with an enormous open plan living room, kitchen and dining room that feels homely and inviting from the moment you step inside. Featuring gorgeous plantation shutters along the edges, a Coonara wood fireplace and timber flooring, the living room presents an ideal place to settle back with a book or chill out with great conversation. The adjacent kitchen mixes touches of nostalgia and cutting edge design with a long Monastic wooden island bench for food preparation and casual meals sitting alongside Bosch appliances and a 6-burner Smeg oven/range-hood that's large enough to feed an entire order of hungry brethren.
For more formal occasions there's a seated dining area as well, leading outside to an enormous covered timber deck that's bound to become the catalyst for weekend barbeques or conversations that continue well into the night.
When sleep finally overtakes you, the home's four bedrooms are clustered towards one side where the master enjoys an ensuite and the three family bedrooms hug the main bathroom and its separate WC. All four bedrooms have built-in robes and are carpeted, while ducted heating and cooling ensures your comfort throughout the seasons. There's even a large internal laundry that leads directly out to the yard. At the other end of the home is a sunken family room, tucked out of sight so that sports fans can watch TV without disturbing the household and fitted with double doors that lead out to another pergola-covered patio at the side.
The rear yard is level with established trees along the borders and includes a garden shed as well as an additional structure that would make a great artist's studio, teenage retreat or games room.
For the cars there's a brick, remote controlled, double garage and a concrete apron that could easily accommodate more vehicles or trailers.
Come for the comfort, stay for a lifetime.

features.otherFeatures: balcony/patio/terrace, modern bathroom, modern kitchen, renovated, renovated bathroom

residential.headline: First Sale in 42 Years
residential.description:
Concealed behind bush flora in a peaceful street, this ultra-private residence is quintessential Aranda - surrounded by vast trees and shrubberies, yet still central to everything Canberra has to offer. An attractive streetscape and front facade are the immediate attractions, supported by an architecturally-designed split-level home that's brimming with character and presents multiple living or entertaining spaces to excite the entire family.
From the moment you step inside it's clear that the entire home has been flawlessly designed by the original owners with the needs of a modern family in mind. Level one is characterised by space and flowing lines and is home to the expansive formal living and dining room complete with open fire place, ideal for cold winter nights spent toasting marshmallows with the family. Just off the living room is the sun-filled kitchen with ample storage including a walk in pantry, a gas stove top and dishwasher together with views to the garden. Level two has a generous family room with a floor to ceiling bookcase and ladder, study nook and sliding glass doors leading out to the delightful gardens.
The segregated bedrooms offer a wonderful oasis to kick back after-hours and enjoy a peaceful night's sleep. The master suite is located just off the entry which includes a walk in robe and modern ensuite. There is also nursery or study filled with natural light from the trapezium windows. Stepping up to level two you'll find two spacious bedrooms with views to the rear gardens. At the end of the hall is the family bathroom which has been tastefully updated with a neutral palette and has a separate toilet.
Private and versatile, the tiered backyard has space for the whole family to enjoy - from the paved entertaining area to the freestanding artist's studio and shed/workshop. If you're after extra entertaining space the gorgeous deck off the formal living room is the perfect place for dinner parties with friends under the comfort of the shade sail while you enjoy the mountain views.
Located within easy reach of leisure activities, sporting facilities, universities, schools, Calvary Hospital or Jamison Centre, & within minutes of the city, Belconnen or Woden, it's obvious why Aranda has gained a reputation as the suburban heart of Canberra and one of our most elite residential addresses.
Features: Beautifully maintained by original owners Architecturally designed split-level home Sought after location in tree-lined street Exceptionally high raked ceilings Spacious living and dining rooms with open fire place Kitchen with gas cooking and dishwasher Separate family room and study nook leading to the backyard Master with ensuite, walk through robe and adjoining nursery/study Extensive timber deck with shade sail Carrier reverse-cycle air-conditioner and gas heater An abundance of storage throughout the entire home Single carport with power and lights Additional car space next to the carport Double glazing to the windows 2013 'Comfort glass' installed to the trapezium window in the nursery/study Gas hot water 2013 Back-to-base security system The exterior was repainted in 2011 Approved free-standing artist's studio Shed/workshop with power, workbench and storage Colorbond gutters Established front and back gardens

features.otherFeatures: bath, garden, internal laundry, enormous timber deck

residential.headline: The Cheapest Piece of Real Estate in Griffith
residential.description:
REDUCED TO SELL!! CURRENTLY TENANTED AT $270 PER WEEK
A wonderful opportunity to secure this ground floor one bedroom unit situated in the ever popular McMillan Gardens complex in Griffith. Perfect for first home buyers, young couples or single professionals wanting to be close to Manuka, the Parliamentary Triangle and the city. It's also a wonderful chance for investors hoping to add to their portfolio with a unit that appeals to a wide demographic of ages and careers.
Stepping inside you'll find an open plan living area with new carpet, featuring dining and kitchen areas with high ceilings and an abundance of natural light. The kitchen offers plentiful storage, good bench space and an electric cook top; there's also the choice of your own internal laundry or communal laundry facilities on-site that come complete with washing machines and clothes dryers.
A generous separate bedroom will accommodate a king or queen-sized bed, as well as hanging space for your clothes, and the ensuite bathroom is finished in neutral tones.
Outside you can relax on your own private verandah or splash away the Summer months in the communal pool within the complex.
Together with the dedicated car space near your front door you'll also find visitor parking inside the grounds. The city, Woden and Fyshwick precincts are within easy reach by car and, considering the apartment's extraordinary location, you may even be tempted to try walking to the closer venues at Manuka and Kingston.
Rates: $218.00 per quarter
Levies; $708.40 per quarter
Private ground floor position within complex
Open plan living/dining room
New carpet throughout
Modern kitchen in neutral tones
Internal laundry facilities
Communal washing machine & clothes dryers also available
In-ground swimming pool
Parking space just outside your door.

residential.headline: Perfectly Positioned Family Home
residential.description:
Nestled in a quiet cul-de-sac and surrounded by house-proud neighbours this privately built three bedroom ensuite family home offers space to grow and enjoy for many years to come. The outside has beautiful street appeal with a delightful rich red brick facade, a covered verandah and manicured garden beds that line the pathway to the front door.
Stepping inside you are greeted with an inviting entry flowing through to a main living room that's filled with natural light. There's also a formal dining room that could be adapted to serve as a home office or play room overlooked by the beautifully renovated kitchen. Preparing meals will become a delight here with a Miele gas stove top & range hood, quality appliances, stone bench tops and white gloss cupboards, plus a breakfast bar and a spacious casual meals area that leads out to a huge covered entertaining deck.
Off the home's hallway are three bedrooms, including the master with an entire wall of built-in robes and a renovated ensuite bathroom that's finished with white tiles, a mirrored cupboard and quality fixtures. The two additional bedrooms are both an excellent size and have built in robes. The family bathroom is also renovated with new white tiles, a modern vanity and new shower screen, as well as a separate toilet. The laundry is extra large in size and leads to the rear yard.
The spacious, fully enclosed backyard offers a plenty of space for children and pets to run and play as well as a huge covered entertaining deck for BBQs and celebrations. There's also a secure double lockup garage with extra workshop space.
With a children's park at the street entry to Nanson Place, it's also within easy reach to Florey shops, Primary schools, Westfield, and only a short drive from the city, it's a home that blends family comfort with local convenience.
Features:
Spacious family home - 150m2 Quiet cul-de-sac location Beautifully presented inside and out Light and bright living room Formal dining room/home office Newly renovated kitchen Miele gas stove top, range hood & dishwasher Three bedrooms all with built in robes Renovated ensuite and main bathroom Spacious laundry with external access Neutral tones and quality curtains throughout Ample storage cupboards throughout the home Ducted gas heating Ducted evaporative cooling Huge covered deck Secure, private backyard Double lock up garage with workshop space

residential.headline: A Blessing for Families
residential.description:
If first impressions count, this beautiful two storey home in Scullin won't leave you second guessing. Privately hidden behind established trees, the modern rendered exterior is just a hint of what you can expect to find throughout this much-loved home.
Opening with a private covered front verandah, inside you'll discover a long formal living and dining room overlooking the front garden plus a central kitchen with ample bench space, quality appliances and plenty of room for casual meals. The open plan kitchen also adjoins an inviting family room where the whole family can gather in front of the wood fire heater. The ground floor is also home to bedrooms three and four, the main bathroom and separate laundry.
Upstairs adds a new dimension of magic with lovely views of the mountains from all the front windows. This level has two enormous bedrooms, each with built-in robes and both adjoining a large two-way bathroom with a bathtub and double vanity.
The top of the stairs also has a generous landing that offers plenty of room for a study desk or sitting area to take full advantage of the peaceful outlook.
Outside there's a beautiful covered entertaining area accessed through sliding glass doors off the family room. For garden lovers the segregated rear yard has fruit trees including two plum trees and a lemon tree, a veggie patch, a lawn area for children or pets plus a garden shed for all your tools. If you need even more space to spread out, there's an over-sized double lock-up garage with space for a workshop and additional storage.
Conveniently located within close proximity to Scullin Pre-School and Scullin neighbourhood oval while Hawker College, Belconnen's CBD, University of Canberra, AIS, Calvary Hospital and GIO stadium are only minutes by car.
Features: Super spacious family home - 203m2 living Immaculate presentation inside and out Formal living and dining room Large open plan kitchen and meals area Extended family room leads to outdoor entertaining Two enormous bedrooms upstairs with built in robes Large two-way bathroom upstairs Two additional bedrooms downstairs Front & rear covered entertaining areas Oversized double garage & workshop Ample storage throughout home Established front and rear gardens Ducted gas heating Slow combustion wood fire heater Close proximity to the Scullin pre-school -Year 3 School Short drive to Belconnen High & Hawker College

residential.headline: Time, Love & Creativity required
residential.description:
If you believe that buying the worst house in the best street is a great real estate strategy, then opportunities don't come much greater than this - and its five bedroom layout with the roomy dimensions of yesteryear mean it's likely to be an opportunity that doesn't last long.
Originally built for the accountant of a popular building company, it's not hard to imagine its oversized proportions were designed to uncompromised standards by an industry professional who understood quality. And offered now as its first sale in 39 years, it's your perfect opportunity to inherit all of that infrastructure, input and ingenuity.
Sprinkle some style, manufacture some magic or fabricate some flair and this expansive five bedroom home is likely to pay you back in handsome dividends. Solidly constructed with a functional layout on the inside and fabulous potential on the outside, it offers a tantalising project for home-makers or investors who are willing to roll up their sleeves and return it to its former heyday while still living on the premises.
Inside you'll find an oversized entry hall that leads to the enormous open plan formal lounge room and adjoining formal dining room. Both rooms are filled with natural light and can be updated or adapted in multiple ways to suit the family needs of 2014.
The kitchen has a walk in pantry, electric cooker and dishwasher together with an open plan meals area that opens to a sunroom via sliding doors.
A long hallway leads to the home's five bedrooms, all with wooden floor boards and built in robes. The main bathroom is enormous and, once renovated, is certain to add an additional wow factor.
A free-standing brick studio at the rear could easily be adapted into a great children's games room, parent's retreat, rumpus or home office.
Sitting on a 1200m2 block, even the outer dimensions are enormous with sprawling gardens providing room to expand or space to grow. A disused in-ground pool hints at the potential on offer for further development or the creation of a central garden area that could turn thumbs green with envy.
Dig, drill, dream and design - it's a delight for anyone who has fantasised about living in the heart of Hawker but has always been deterred by the price tag.
Features: First sale in 39 Years Huge block: 1204m2 Land value: UV$492,000 Perfectly positioned across from park Enormous formal living & dining rooms Open plan kitchen & family room Five bedrooms with built in robes Massive main bathroom Additional bathroom with shower & wc Double lock up garage with internal access Ducted oil heating Reverse cycle heating/cooling in the kitchen Spacious laundry Wooden floorboards Separate brick studio Large front & rear gardens

residential.headline: PERFECT FOR FAMILIES & ENTERTAINERS
residential.description:
Families know what's important in life - a quiet loop street, a safe location near green fields and convenience to shopping, schools, transport, a pony club and lots of entertainment options at home.
This gorgeous four-bedroom home offers all of that and more, from its pretty kerbside appearance to the wonderland of child-friendly grassed terraces at the rear.
Set on the high side of the street in a picturesque location looking towards rolling hills, you'll find it hidden behind beautiful autumn trees that create a privacy screen for its front courtyard which is bathed in natural sunlight.
Deeper inside there's a warm and inviting living space finished in neutral tones that offers wonderful views, plus a study nook area in the corner that could easily be adapted to a small office, a computer workstation or an ideal spot for quiet after-school homework.
The kitchen offers a top of the range pyrolytic oven, plus ample preparation, storage and serving space in its easy U-shaped layout. It adjoins a family room that acts as a natural hub of the home for everyday activities, radiating out to each of the family bedrooms, the home's bathroom and separate toilet as well as a huge covered entertainment area just outside. There's even a custom made window seat with additional storage and a flat-screen TV.
The master bedroom and its renovated ensuite enjoys a northern corner, discrete enough for privacy and rest, yet close enough to the extra three bedrooms for care and nurturing. Each of the family bedrooms includes custom built in wardrobes.
Outside, the back garden is an entertainer's haven. The enormous covered pergola could easily accommodate a host of friends and family events while the raised lawn area provides a separate space for the children and pets to play. There's also a triple car garage for motoring enthusiasts.
Short stroll to the nature reserve Gorgeous mountain views Enormous covered entertaining area Glorious established front & rear gardens Segregated master bedroom with ensuite Three additional bedrooms with custom made BIR's Private paved front courtyard Renovated kitchen with pyrolytic oven Family room complete with a flat screen television Triple car garage Short stroll to the nature reserve Close to local schools and shops

residential.headline: Fabulous Family Home
residential.description:
Set in a quiet cu-de-sac, with south-easterly views over low-profile neighbouring properties, this tri-level home offers flexibility, functionality and family-friendliness throughout its well-designed floor plan.
Beyond the delightful front garden, featuring a rose lined pathway and arched vines on the porch, you'll find a front entry with high ceilings opening up the home's middle-level. Beside the wooden staircase that leads up to the top level, is a huge formal living room with raked ceilings that's warmed by a gas fire heater on the inside and spills further to a covered entertaining area outside. Down a small set of stairs is a powder room that can be accessed internally and externally as well as additional storage under the stairs.
Stepping down to the right from the entry there's the home's modern kitchen with a gas cooktop, an adjoining meals area, a family room and the fifth bedroom or study, complete with shelving, desk and filing cabinet. Off the kitchen you'll also find an oversized room which can be used as a home office or rumpus room.
Venturing upstairs you'll discover the evening accommodation including a huge master with a renovated ensuite, large walk-in robe and a delightful private balcony overlooking wonderful views of Black Mountain Tower and the horizon. Bedrooms two and three have new carpet while bedroom four is an alternative master, located towards the front of the home with mountain views and a built-in robe. Upstairs also includes the home's renovated family bathroom and a separate toilet plus additional storage and linen cupboards.
Outside the backyard is enclosed, creating a private oasis with plenty of room for children or pets to play and explore as you entertain from the covered pergola.
Conveniently located within a stone's throw of green parks, it's also just a healthy stroll along walking tracks from local suburban shops and within minutes by car of Belconnen's CBD.
Features:
Flexible tri-level floor plan Five bedrooms plus large home office or rumpus Master bedroom with WIR, ensuite and balcony Bedrooms three & four have brand new carpet Fifth bedroom currently fitted with built-in shelving & desk Spacious living room with gas fireplace & access to entertaining area Extra large home office or rumpus room Renovated main bathroom and ensuite Downstairs powder room Huge amounts of storage upstairs & downstairs Gas bayonets in the family room and home office Air conditioner in the kitchen Gas fire place in the living room Generous laundry with new tub Ceiling fans in all four upstairs bedrooms Established enclosed rear gardens Delightful front gardens Entertaining area with covered pergola Double lock up garage with automatic door Living Space: 222m2 plus double garaging

residential.headline: FIRST SALE BY ORIGINAL OWNERS
residential.description:
NORTH FACING HOME & FREE STANDING STUDIO
Nestled on a quiet, leafy street in Flynn, this delightful north-facing three-bedroom home offers massive street appeal with its lush front gardens and sculptural facade.
The welcoming entry is a generous area where you can leave your umbrella and shake off the wintery chills before heading into the warmth of the living and sleeping quarters.
A spacious living room is completed with neutral tones and oversized windows, adjoining a generous casual-meals area and revealing a charming arched entry to the kitchen. Here you'll find plenty of storage and preparation space, a Bosch dishwasher and servery window through to the sunroom. Just off the kitchen is the home's family sized laundry, with easy access to the rear gardens.
Set towards the back of the home a delightful brick sunroom captures the northern sunlight through floor-to-ceiling glass windows lining the walls. This light, bright additional feature flows on neatly from the kitchen and can easily be adapted as spacious rumpus room or even a second living room for children to play. Large glass sliding doors open out to a glorious entertaining deck with a covered pergola that's ideal for lazy Sunday afternoons and gatherings with friends.
Wrapped around the home's western edge are the bedrooms and bathrooms. The peaceful master is flooded with natural light and has its own ensuite that's been tastefully renovated plus a full wall of mirrored built-in robes. The two family bedrooms are both a good size and are conveniently located near the home's renovated main bathroom and separate wc.
If you're looking for somewhere with extra space for a teenager, or even an extended family member, this is ready-made to delight you. Set to the rear of the yard is the self-contained studio, featuring built-in robes, a kitchenette and space for both a bed and lounge room area. Reverse-cycle heating and cooling, plus the convenience of their own ensuite, will keep your relatives or overnight guests pampered.
The beautiful backyard is brimming with flowers, hedges and fruit trees - plus there's a level lawn area for children to enjoy as well as a veggie patch and garden shed.
Features include: North facing home & free standing studio Immaculate presentation inside and out Three spacious bedrooms plus ensuite Huge north facing sunroom/rumpus room Open plan living and dining room Renovated main bathroom and ensuite Sun-filled kitchen and breakfast bar Ducted gas heating & evaporative cooling Extensive timber deck with pergola Glorious established gardens Studio with bathroom, kitchenette & heating/cooling Wall insulation to house and studio Large carport, garden shed & under house storage Four bedrooms, three bathrooms in total: House: 146m2 living Studio: 33m2 living

residential.headline: NORTH FACING FIVE BEDROOM ENSUITE HOME PLUS A STUDIO & YURT!
residential.description:
Sitting stylishly in one of Hawker's best locations is this immaculate five bedroom ensuite north-facing home, plus a studio and a free-standing Californian yurt. Discreetly hidden behind established front gardens and offering plenty of space for children's adventures or casual entertaining in the warm sunlight. The home's covered front entertaining area is an ideal spot to host BBQs and drinks throughout the seasons or enjoy a quiet picnic lunch on the private grassed terrace.
Stepping inside you'll find a welcoming layout spread over two levels. The downstairs portion provides a generous formal living and dining room that's kept naturally warm and bright thanks to large northerly windows as well as an open plan family room and kitchen that keeps the daily meals and leisure activities centred.
The lower floor also houses the master bedroom with its ensuite, main bathroom and second bedroom, that can double as a study or computer room, and the home's large laundry which directly accesses the back garden.
Climbing up the timber staircase, you'll find three additional sleeping quarters - bedrooms three, four and five - all with built in robes and charming views to the rear gardens.
Bedroom six is particularly special - situated in a separate studio adjacent to the main house - it's absolutely perfect for teenagers needing their first taste of freedom or for elderly relatives who want to maintain a sense of independence while still being within easy reach. The studio also contains a generous ensuite and a workshop/hobby area that offers additional storage or the potential to be reinvented as even more floor space.
Yet another extraordinary bonus is a free-standing Californian yurt - a gorgeous customised timber dwelling towards the rear of the yard that's as mesmerising and magical as it is quirky. Its extraordinary charm is an inspired touch - a genuine retreat where the parents or guests can get some rest from everyday worries and a delightful escape to enjoy a break overnight without ever leaving the property.
The rear yard has been thoughtfully designed too - divided into specific areas for play and work. There's a beautiful stone entertaining area, complete with a built-in BBQ, that spans the width of the home plus a long, tapered grass yard on an upper tier that borders vast raised herb and vegetable gardens - large enough to supplement the family's dinner needs and inviting enough to make gardener's thumbs green with envy. There's also a shed, a separate lower garden with succulents and provision for parking a trailer.
Factor in the access to local schools or the convenience of Hawker's wonderful shopping centre and beautiful parklands.....you'll agree this is a home that's got it all - position, lifestyle and charm.

residential.headline: SPACIOUS HOME WITH FIVE BEDROOMS PLUS STUDY
residential.description:
From the kerbside it's easy to think this well-located five bedroom home at the inner edge of Page is more compact than you might have expected but, as soon as you venture inside, you'll find an extraordinarily spacious layout that opens up more and more at every turn.
Starting with a remarkably spacious front courtyard and cottage gardens, the obliquely-sited front door opens up to brick and wood panel entrance that's reminiscent of a cosy snow chalet. To the left, a carpeted sunken living room offers a private retreat that includes high-raked ceilings and an extraordinary sit-in amphitheatre around a wood-fire heater.
You can explore to the right to find the evening accommodation, made up of a master bedroom that adjoins a two-way ensuite, four additional bedrooms plus a separate study as well as the home's main bathroom and toilet.
Further along the hall is the kitchen, including a vast semi-circular bench top for preparation and serving, together with great cupboard space, gast stove top and appliances. It's here you'll find a large family room that could easily be adapted for a multitude of uses all of which lead through glass doors to an outdoor sitting area and a single lock-up garage with internal access.
Capping it all is the location and convenience to local facilities - with Belconnen's CBD and the local fresh food markets just a stroll away or the AIS, Stadium, hospital, University and Lake Ginninderra within easy driving distance.
Huge living room with raked ceilings & wood-fire heater Modern open plan kitchen and family room Five bedrooms, four with BIR's and new carpet Additional study off the kitchen with new carpet Main bathroom plus two way ensuite Single lock up garage Ducted gas heating Private paved front courtyard Easy care gardens Quiet cul-de-sac location Short walk to Belconnen Living area 212m2 Strata plan consists of two units only - Unit Plan No. 3472 Levies: $1426 per annum Rates: $1357 per annum

residential.headline: Entertainer's Haven plus a Yurt
residential.description:
Beautifully presented both inside and out, sited in an unbeatable cul-de-sac location and brimming with character and charm - it all sounds like a dream check-list for property lovers and yet they're descriptions you could easily apply to this delightful home. Gulgong's street appeal even includes a quiet park within metres of your front door where your children can play after walking home from the nearby primary schools.
On arrival you'll find a home tucked behind established gardens and beautiful spring blossoms, with landscaped, low maintenance front & rear gardens that offer multiple opportunities for relaxing and entertaining. Venturing inside from the front deck you'll discover a spacious formal entry leading to a living and dining room, both finished in neutral tones with natural sunlight streaming from both north and south facing windows plus charming views across the greenery outside.
At the heart of the home is the kitchen, with stainless steel appliances and plenty of space for preparation or storage, as well as an adjoining family and meals area featuring polished timber floor boards and extra wide glass doors that open to the backyard.
To the rear of the home, the sleeping quarters are designed to hug the home's main bathroom facilities, with its open plan vanity, toilet and bath-tub together with a second separate toilet. The master bedroom is generously sized, including two built-in robes and a pretty outlook over the front gardens. Bedrooms two and three also feature built-in robes and both can easily accommodate a queen sized bed, while the fourth bedroom would make an ideal nursery or study - naturally adaptable with a north facing glass door leading outside.
The beautiful landscaping of the rear yard is eclipsed by the home's other extraordinary feature, a free-standing Yurt that offers fun, functionality and fascination in the form of a magical multi-purpose room. Augmented by paved areas, decking and a sheltered carport, this quintessential Australian backyard is a space to entertain and enjoy all year round.
Located within easy reach of the Chapman Primary School, Mt Stromlo High School, Arawang Primary School, St John Vianney Primary School, Chapman Neighbourhood Oval and Cooleman Court shopping precinct, you're spoiled for choice in every direction.

residential.headline: North facing apartment with lovely parkland views
residential.description:
Located only metres from the City, opposite the popular and beautiful Haig Park, this one bedroom apartment is the perfect entry level home for the first home buyer or a great investment with a professional tenant currently paying $350 per week.
Nestled on the northern side of the building, on level five, the open plan living and dining room is bathed in natural sunlight and opens out to the sunny balcony with views overlooking the parkland. Finished in neutral tones with a decorative curved wall, this delightful room also offers year-round comfort with a reverse cycle air-conditioner.
The modern kitchen has ample storage both below and above the stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and a drawer dishwasher.
Boasting a sunlit northerly aspect the main bedroom easily accommodates a double bed and has mirrored built-in robes. The bathroom has floor to ceiling tiles, oversized shower and European style laundry with dryer.

residential.headline: North Facing Furnished Top Floor Apartment
residential.description:
Set in an enviable location in the heart of Kingston, this top floor residence in 'Kingston Place' is sure to be on the wish list of anyone wanting to live in the inner south.
This designer apartment has had no expense spared with quality fixtures and fittings, stone bench tops and Miele appliances including an integrated dishwasher. The breakfast bar offers plenty of space for friends to sit and chat as you cook.
The light and bright open plan living and dining is bathed in northern sun and leads out to the spacious balcony with magical mountain views.
The master bedroom is also a generous size; easily accommodating a queen bed and large built-in robes with custom drawers and hanging space. It also has the luxury of private access to the balcony through floor to ceiling glass sliding doors. The adjacent bathroom is a modern oasis of clean lines, lavish granite and glass. There is also a European style laundry neatly tucked away out of sight.
Complete with quality furniture this beautiful apartment is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy.

residential.headline: First home or fantastic Florey tenant for investors!!
residential.description:
Set in a quiet complex of only ten at the end of a small cul-de-sac, this delightful two bedroom townhouse is sure to please a wide range of buyers!
Stepping inside you are welcomed with a warm and inviting living and dining room that is filled with sunlight from the large window and glass sliding door.
The open plan kitchen and family room is also light and bright and opens out to the large rear courtyard through floor to ceiling glass sliding doors. The kitchen features neutral tones, electric cooking, large pantry cupboard and breakfast bar.
The two bedrooms are set at the front of the home, both a good size with built-in robes and overlook the front garden. The spacious bathroom has a bath and shower, separate w/c and open vanity area that are all in good condition plus there is also a separate laundry.
Blessed with northern orientation to both the fully enclosed front and rear courtyards, these delightful outdoor areas will be an asset come summer or winter. The front courtyard is enriched by the covered front verandah that is decorated with established vines and has been recently turfed, perfect for young children.
The generous back courtyard is sectioned into different areas by the use of paving. It is very low maintenance with only the established trees and shrubs to look after and is the ideal place to invite friends and family over for a barbeque.

residential.headline: Picture Perfect Parkland Position
residential.description:
Perfectly positioned on a huge 1124m2 block in what is arguably the best street in Rivett, this character filled four bedroom home will suit all your family's needs.
Walking through the delightful front gardens that are brimming with herbs and veggies you are welcomed with a large covered verandah and attractive lead light glass doors. Overlooking the parkland, the front verandah is the ideal place to relax and enjoy the eastern sunlight and is also easily accessed from the living room through French doors.
The generous tiled entry leads you through to the open plan meals and kitchen area featuring a Glem six burner gas/electric stove, decorative lead light cupboards and a dishwasher. The light and bright meals area also opens out through sliding doors onto the expansive timber deck. Just off the meals area is the spacious living area plus there is a study nook near the stairs leading to the downstairs games room.
Off the hallway are the four bedrooms all with polished timber flooring and three with built in robes. The generous master and second bedroom both enjoy views over the front gardens, while bedrooms three and four overlook the rear gardens. There is also a character filled bathroom with vintage wooden vanity and separate wc.
Downstairs you will find a huge double garage with additional workshopspace plus a generous multipurpose room that would make the perfect man cave or an ideal games room for teenagers and even has its own rock climbing wall. There is also a separate laundry with easy access to the back yard.
Benefit from the huge savings on your electricity bills with nine solar panels and a solar hot water system with electricity booster switch.
Outside you are blessed with a substantial stepped rear garden complete with swing set and dog run. The large rear deck is the ideal place to entertain this summer and enjoy the delightful mountain views. The beautiful gardens have been organically maintained for the last 14 years by the current owner.
