residential.headline: North Facing Free-standing "Liberty" Townhouse in Elevated Position
residential.description:
Situated in an elevated, premium position in one of Bruce's most sought after complexes, this immaculately presented, free-standing four bedroom en-suite townhouse will appeal to the most fastidious buyers.
The vibrant colours of the gorgeous plants and flowers greet you from the front gardens and extend through to the glorious rear entertaining area and paved courtyard.
This property is an entertainer's dream. The wide entrance foyer opens to a spacious formal living and dining room featuring state-of-the-art fireplace, you can gather together sharing stories or step out onto the front balcony to enjoy the views of Black Mountain and the Brindabellas.
The generously sized open plan family room is another feature in itself to accommodate extra guests comfortably with a built-in entertaining unit and ceiling set speakers catering for those that enjoy surround sound.
Culinary dreams of the resident chef come to life in the kitchen at heart of the home with well-appointed Smeg stainless steel appliances, designed with plenty of cupboard space and stone bench tops.
Take the conversation outdoors to the privacy of the low maintenance paved courtyard with expansive timber entertaining deck, which extends seamlessly from the open plan family room. Bordering bush reserve and lined with an array of glorious plants and flowers, making this versatile area, a perfect place to wind down at the end of the day.
The evening accommodation lies discreetly grouped together on the end of the property, with a spacious master bedroom, generous ensuite, walk-in robe and a private balcony that captures the stunning views across the mountains, plus three additional bedrooms with built-in robes. All four bedrooms have easy access to the home's main bathroom, laundry and separate toilet, as well as its corridor cupboard for extra storage.
Discover more storage potential as you venture down the stairwell which leads to the internal access of the oversized double garage where a carpeted storage room is currently being used as a home office.
Offering quality fittings and features throughout including Italian porcelain tiles to living areas, ducted reverse cycle air conditioning and located close to local shops, Radford College, University of Canberra, Calvary Hospital, Belconnen Town centre and Civic.
You do not want to miss out on an inspection!

residential.headline: Taking Luxury to New Heights
residential.description:
Situated in the desirable "Lakefront" complex and sharing the top floor with only one other, Apartment 46 takes luxury living to new heights.
This two bedroom ensuite apartment features delightful lake views and boasts quality fixtures and fittings throughout with the living area extending out to the spacious 25m2 balcony.
From the moment you step inside, the large functional floor plan allows you to relax and leave your stress at the door. Enjoy the lake views from the comfort of the living room or out on the covered balcony, through floor to ceiling double sliding doors. The balcony is also fitted with a gas outlet for enjoying a BBQ during the warmer Canberra months.
For the home chef, show off your culinary skills in the kitchen equipped with stone bench tops and Miele appliances including a 900mm, five burner gas cooktop with electric ignition, coupled with a Miele 900mm 85L large capacity oven with touch controls and stainless steel finish, Miele dishwasher and a built-in microwave.
Both spacious bedrooms have built-in robes, the master bedroom enjoys a private second balcony to take in the wonderful views and a large ensuite featuring a vanity with his and her basins and frameless shower screens.
No matter what the Canberra weather throws at you, know that your comfort is ensured with ducted air conditioning and heating all year round. Also featuring a secure voice and video access control for visitors and a concealed laundry with washing machine and clothes dryer.
Enjoy the convenience and be spoilt for choice of being within moments from either the Kingston shopping precinct or the Manuka hub.
Discover for yourself what this modern top floor apartment has to offer!

residential.headline: Award Winning Design, Golf Course Frontage.....The Ultimate Lifestyle!
residential.description:
A truly exceptional opportunity awaits one lucky family. This award-winning five-bedroom ensuite property is perched on the very edge of the Gold Creek golf course with spectacular views over the peaceful greens and fairways. Superbly positioned behind the Club's signature 14th tee, you'll have all the advantages of this peaceful outlook and yet be shielded from wayward balls.
The enormous open-plan living room combined with a spacious dining room and a fabulous kitchen is the centrepiece to this glorious home. The kitchen features quality stainless steel appliances including near new Miele induction hot plates, an Ilve 900mm oven and Miele integrated dishwasher.
The luxurious master bedroom has a generous walk-in robe, ensuite and glass sliding doors leading to a private raised patio that takes in the beautiful views overlooking the golf course. The three additional bedrooms, the first main bathroom and the laundry are situated towards one end of the house. At the opposite end of the property is the fifth bedroom, ideal for a teenager or relative yearning for space and privacy, with its own ensuite that doubles as a second main bathroom.
Also upstairs is a library for relaxed reading and the home's sixth bedroom or massive home office complete with two large computer work-stations and shelving, as well as giving unparalleled views across the fairways and the swimming pool from its own private balcony.
Downstairs there's plenty of entertainment available in the media/theatre room, with a ceiling mounted Sony projector & surround-sound speakers, as well as even more full-length windows capitalising on the magnificent vista across the pool and the golf course.
Outside the home you'll find lifestyle options that are practically overwhelming, with a breath-taking outdoor dining area - complete with a built-in gas BBQ, wok burner and bar fridge - that not only commands the best views of the fairways but also presides over the glorious sparkling-blue swimming pool and six-person spa. Effortlessly impressive, this state-of-the-art, fully automated, self-cleaning pool has both solar & gas heating and is guaranteed to take pride of place in your new lifestyle.
On the northern side is an enclosed grassy yard for pets, including an additional paved entertaining area that's perfect for sunlit outdoor breakfasts and alfresco dining.
While the property is clearly a golf-worshipper's ultimate 19th hole, this exquisite home is so inspired that it will even leave non-players with an undeniable sense that they're standing inside a five star resort - idyllic, secluded, warm and peaceful. With 292m2 of living and a 2.5 car garage - 65m2, even extended families will feel pampered with their own personal space.
Winner of the HIA Residential Award in 2005 and an exclusive design by Ross Norwood, it's an architectural achievement that's been laid out for a luxurious lifestyle - not built to a budget.

Sited on a generous 980m2 block, this unique split level three bedroom ensuite home is sure to suit any growing family.

residential.headline: Perfectly Positioned & Beautifully Presented Single Level Villa
residential.description:
Set in a small sought after complex, this gorgeous single level townhouse is ideal for those looking to downsize, invest or a professional couple looking for a spacious home with established, low maintenance gardens in a highly desirable location.

residential.headline: Immaculate North Facing Family Home
residential.description:
Perfectly positioned in a quiet core area location, this immaculate north facing three bedroom ensuite residence is just waiting for a new family to call it home. Our current owners have done all the hard work for you, so you can simply unpack and enjoy.
From the front this beautiful home exudes charm with generous landscaping and a quaint paved path that leads you to the front verandah, where you can relax in the shade from the established trees. The light and bright entry is the perfect place to hang your coats and opens out to the formal living and dining room. This generous room is filled with natural light from the north facing windows and is large enough to accommodate a dining table for entertaining.
The heart of any home is the kitchen and ours has enjoyed a recent renovation with brand new bench tops, splash backs and superior Ariston stainless steel appliances including a four burner gas stove top and pyrolytic self-cleaning oven. There is plenty of preparation space and once you are finished you can simply put everything into the new dishwasher. The family room off the kitchen is ideal for keeping an eye on the children as they complete their homework or as an additional meals area.
The master bedroom has an abundance of storage and the luxury of its own crisp white ensuite bathroom. The two additional bedrooms both have built-in robes and the larger of the two has room for a study nook.
If you are after even more space the fully enclosed and approved sunroom offers an extra 40m2 of space and is the ideal area for entertaining or a children's play room.
The current owners have put a lot of thought into making this home family friendly and have also fitted out a brand new home office/games room with reverse-cycle air conditioning that is sure to please any man looking for his own 'Man Cave' big enough to hold a pool table and is conveniently tucked behind the automatic double brick garage.
Perfectly suited to both families and couples alike, the large level rear garden is the ideal retreat for entertaining friends and family under the shade of the large established trees and offers an abundance of space for the children to run and play on the freshly laid turf.
Situated on a quiet leafy street surrounded by many original neighbours with nearby walking tracks to Mt Rogers and only a short drive or bus ride to the heart of Belconnen, UC, the City and Gungahlin.

residential.headline: Views, Space and Lifestyle
residential.description:
Situated in an elevated position with lovely water views and within a short stroll to the nearby foreshores of Yerrabi Pond, this low maintenance three bedroom ensuite townhouse is definitely one of the most sought after in the quiet and peaceful complex.
Stepping inside this well presented home, the entry hallway leads you down to the open living areas on the first floor with an abundance of natural light offering generous living and dining rooms. Immediately alongside is a meals area and kitchen that boasts ample cupboards for storage including a pull out pantry, stainless steel dishwasher, near new oven and cooktop. The laundry is well equipped with additional cupboards for storage and the powder room is also located on this level.
Two side-by-side sliding glass doors allow you to take full advantage of the outlook to Yerrabi Pond. Family and friends will be impressed with the beautiful water views from the living room, courtyard and timber entertaining deck fitted with decking lights and lined with easy care plants.
The top floor comprises two bedrooms and a bathroom, including the master with walk-in robe and ensuite. Both bedrooms enjoy ceiling fans and sliding door access to a second private balcony that spans the width of the home to take in the gorgeous views from a whole new level. The segregated third bedroom is on the lower level complete with built-in robes - perfect for guests or a home office.
Your comfort is ensured all year round thanks to the new roof insulation as well as ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Conveniently located within a few minutes stroll to Yerrabi Pond foreshore, transport and local amenities. Astute buyers will not allow a desirable property such as this one pass them by.
Key Features: Elevated quiet location Small well maintained complex Views to Yerrabi Pond Beautifully presented inside and out Modern kitchen with pull-out pantry Near new stainless steel oven and cooktop New carpets (2014) Ceiling fans to upstairs bedrooms Ducted heating and evaporative cooling New roof insulation (2014) Double automatic garage with internal access Beautiful entertaining deck with built-in lighting Low maintenance landscaped courtyards NBN connected

residential.headline: Fantastic Family Home
residential.description:
Provisional Reserve $725,000
Often regarded as one of the most sought after suburbs in Canberra, Aranda is fast becoming the top of everyone's wish list when looking to buy. Offering a location that is hard to beat, sited next to a well-loved children's playground and park and only minutes from Aranda Primary, St Vincent's Primary Schooland and Aranda Playing fields.
Entering through the decorative wrought iron gate you are welcomed with a private front courtyard offering a secluded oasis for al-fresco dining or a peaceful area to simply enjoy a good book.
The well thought out floor plan has multiple living spaces including a delightful sunken living room with extra high ceilings and sliding doors out to the courtyard. Finished with beautiful timber and a neutral palate, it is a warm and welcoming room that invites the outside in through large light-filled windows. Just off the sunken living room is the formal dining room that will easily accommodate an eight person table and has beautiful parquetry floors that flow into the entry.
The kitchen is brimming with quality stainless steel appliances and has ample storage and preparation space with the addition of an island bench and breakfast bar. There is also an adjoining meals area/family room. The segregated master bedroom is located at the front of the home. Generous in size it has its own Juliet balcony overlooking the park; walk through wardrobe and ensuite bathroom with true double shower and large windows looking out to the tree tops. The three additional bedrooms are located at the back of the home and share an enormous bathroom.
Outside you will find a raised rear deck. Down the stairs is the extra-large laundry and plenty of under house storage. The stepped backyard is shaded by established Mongolian pear trees that look stunning through every season, from the red leaves in autumn, beautiful blossoms in spring and they drop their leaves in the winter to allow the light to filter through to the home. There is also a spacious double width garage and work shop space with multiple power points and lighting making it ideal for any home handyman or car enthusiast.

residential.headline: A Winning Combination of Location & Style
residential.description:
Driving into the 'Yorktown' complex you would be forgiven for thinking you had left Australia and stepped into the streets of Virginian Architecture. Strikingly different from your traditional town houses dotted throughout Bruce, 'Yorktown' offers a simple flowing floor plan with a unique facade and unbeatable location backing parkland.
The lower level offers an enormous formal living and dining room that is filled with natural sunlight and leads out to the back courtyard. Opening through beautiful French doors from the living room is the good sized kitchen that is finished in neutral tones with gas cooktop and a dishwasher. The large family room lends itself to many options from a second living/dining room, home office or even a children's play room. With sliding doors to the outside courtyard where you can entertain under the shade of the established trees or if you are looking for more space simply open the back gate to the parkland behind. Also on the ground floor is the generous sized laundry with access to the service courtyard and a separate powder room.
Upstairs is home to the master bedroom with walk-through robe and ensuite bathroom. This spacious light filled room has two large windows and a Juliet balcony plus there are two additional bedrooms both with built-in robes and a main bathroom with bathtub, shower and a separate toilet. There is also the added bonus of an upstairs study nook that is ideal for a home office.
Conveniently located within metres of Bruce's well-known Cafe Momo and a short stroll from the tantalizing Ellacure Restaurant and minutes from Radford College, University of Canberra and Westfield, this unique three bedroom ensuite townhouse presents an opportunity for families, first home buyers and down-sizers looking to get into a remarkably vibrant pocket of Bruce.

residential.headline: NORTH FACING SEPARATE TITLE TOWNHOUSE - NO BODY CORPORATE FEES
residential.description:
Provisional Reserve $495,000
If you are looking for a home that is not only filled with character and flair but is also separate title north facing and located in a thriving suburb, then this is the one for you! From the extra high ceilings in the living room to the spiral staircase, this home is bursting with unique features that so many of us crave, but rarely find.
With a bit of imagination this home has the perfect bones to be transformed into something that is truly special. Whether you have an eclectic taste or a lover of all things retro, this home lends itself to whatever you decide.
The light and bright north facing kitchen and meals area opens out to the fully enclosed private front courtyard. The huge living and dining room is a vast open space, enhanced with extra high ceilings and large sliding doors that lead out to the rear courtyard. There is even an 80's style built-in bar that is discreetly hidden behind panel doors, perfect for entertaining friends. Just off the living room is an enormous laundry and a separate downstairs powder room.
At the top of the spiral staircase is a large open space ideal as a home office or second sitting area. The master is a generous size with its own ensuite bathroom and built-in wardrobes. The main bathroom features a full sized bath and separate shower and is easily accessed by the two additional bedrooms, both with built-in robes. The entire upstairs also enjoys brand new quality carpet, allowing you to simply unpack and move straight in.
Outside there is a large rear courtyard ideal for weekend BBQs or you can enjoy a peaceful breakfast in the fully enclosed north facing front courtyard. If you are looking for even more room you are only a short walk from the Cook Neighbourhood Oval.
Perfectly located opposite a bus stop, Cook local shops and only minutes to Jamison centre, Belconnen Town Centre and connecting roads to the City, Gungahlin and the Tuggeranong Parkway.

residential.headline: Five Bedroom Home on the Water's Edge - 210m2 living
residential.description:
Provisional Reserve $620,000
Available vacant possession or current tenant paying $740 pw and very keen to re-sign a new two year lease.
Tauss Place is synonymous with quiet village communities of meandering paved roads, but few have the added advantage of peaceful waters within metres of their boundary.
Number 10 in the "Bruce Waters" Hamlet is one of the rarest, sited ideally at the end of the private road with the northern sun warming its entrance and the lake at its rear.
The lower floor plan features a large open-plan living/dining room and kitchen that spills out to the homes paved rear courtyard, semi-enclosed by bushes but still open to the relaxing pathways and the views around the lake. Adjoining the rear courtyard is the family room or rumpus room, offering privacy from the rest of the house via folding doors or additional floor space to the living area for entertainment and parties.
The ground floor also has a large laundry off the kitchen, a powder room, internal access to the double garage and ample storage facilities. There's also the first of five bedrooms which adjoins a second courtyard at the front for morning reading.
Upstairs is the bulk of the evening accommodation, each bedroom with built-in robes, as well as the home's main bathroom. The extra large master bedroom has a walk-in robe and ensuite, overlooking the water.
Pretty and private by design, it's also a deceivingly large dwelling offering space and functionality together with a peaceful position and an outstanding rare outlook.
Explore the convenience of Bruce's surroundings and you'll discover the Canberra Stadium, restaurants, AIS, UC, Radford College and bushwalks are virtually on your doorstep while Belconnen's CBD is just a short drive away.

residential.headline: Gorgeous Single Level Home in Complex of Four
residential.description:
Set in one of Belconnen's most elite suburbs, it is easy to see why quality homes in Bruce are selling so quickly. Flawlessly maintained and beautifully presented, this three bedroom ensuite, free-standing home is truly gorgeous.
Nestled in a small, tightly held complex of four, the internal attractions include a formal living room filled with natural sunlight from the two front arch windows finished with quality plantation shutters, matched in style with timber flooring and a neutral colour palette. The separate formal dining room alongside makes an ideal link between the front living area and the kitchen and is bound to be the centre of attention for family get-togethers or seasonal celebrations.
The kitchen features quality appliances, light timber coloured cabinetry and north facing windows, while a broad family room with sliding doors opens up even more alfresco dining options - a paved entertaining area at the rear that's surrounded by greenery and flowers.
On the property's western edge, segregated from the living areas, is the large master bedroom with a four-door built-in robe and a beautifully appointed ensuite with extra large shower. The two additional bedrooms are both a generous size with built-in robes. There is also a large main bathroom with bathtub and separate wc and the spacious laundry with external access.
Outside is a glorious cottage-style garden, privately sheltered by established conifers along the fence to create a peaceful north-facing haven that's likely to draw you into the sunshine from morning tea until the evening meal.
With ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning in the family room, double automatic garage and electric roller shutters on the large north facing windows, the entire dwelling is set in a super quiet location bordered by equally well-loved homes and a green belt.
Just a short stroll from the local park and children's playground and offering a central location close to Radford College, the University of Canberra, Calvary Hospital, AIS and the Canberra Stadium, you'll also find it's just a healthy stroll from CISAC or Emu Bank's popular restaurants along the local walking trails and excellent bike tracks.

residential.headline: Position, Presentation ...... Perfection!
residential.description:
Situated on a level block within easy reach of Gungahlin's town centre and just a healthy stroll from Yerrabi Pond, this immaculate four bedroom ensuite home offers more than comfort and convenience that you can enjoy immediately. There's also a flexible floor plan, north facing living areas, an abundance of natural light, freshly painted neutral tones throughout and new carpets installed in the spacious formal areas and bedrooms.
Leading off the formal living room, a sunny and spacious kitchen provides a four burner gas cooktop, stainless steel electric oven and pantry that's bound to make family feasts and entertaining friends a joy rather than a chore.
Alternatively, extend the laughter through the glass sliding doors off the family room and continue the conversation under the pergola in the privacy of your own secure backyard.
Three bedrooms including the master are situated just down the hallway, each featuring built-in robes while the master has a walk-in robe and ensuite. The fourth bedroom is neatly segregated at the front of the house so that it can be easily adapted as a guest room, study or home office.
Other features include additional storage cupboards in the kitchen/family room, Brivis ducted cooling and a Honeywell ducted heating system that's been freshly serviced (March 2015) and an automatic double garage with internal access. It's also Foxtel and NBN ready to keep your data needs at the cutting edge.
Single level living set in a beautiful location with fresh interiors, an adaptable layout and immaculate presentation. There are no more boxes to tick!

residential.headline: Peace Privacy & Style
residential.description:
Taking the indoors out or bringing the outdoors in - from either perspective this enticing four bedroom, two bathroom home is captivating. What a beautiful balance of home and garden.
From the moment of entering the gorgeous front courtyard, you will feel the warmth of this lovely home that has been thoughtfully and consistently upgraded so that quality and style resonate throughout.
Every room has a garden vista and several rooms open onto the courtyard. Whether relaxing or entertaining, the joys of this setting are evident.
The kitchen is a chef's dream. Wide Caesarstone benches for preparing and serving, Miele appliances, gas cooking, integrated fridge, freezer and microwave, as well as a pull out pantry.
Ducted heating and cooling, pure wool carpets, hardwood flooring and a spacious tiled family room are just a few of the many features of this family or executive residence.
Creatively landscaped grounds with spaces for quiet moments in a secure, private environment. residential.headline: More than meets the eye
residential.description:
Secluded behind shade trees and a private entrance, this five bedroom, three bathroom home, which also offers a study, simply begs for large families to make it their own.
The spacious courtyard entry is perfect for spilling out from the living area to have family gatherings or entertain friends in the open air on balmy summer evenings.
This lovely home has many happy memories and I'm sure the children who have grown up here would have many captivating tales to tell.
For a fresh start for prospective buyers, the owners have had new carpet laid throughout and freshly painted the whole interior. The wet areas of the property are in good original condition and any renovations in the future will only value add.
Character adding exposed beams, high ceilings and highlight windows certainly add style to this residence. There is a servery between the kitchen and the dining room and a family room adjoins the kitchen and opens to the rear garden.
Parents of large families will find the segregated parents' retreat a sanctuary with a bathroom and walk-in robe as well as a large wall of built-ins. It also opens to the leafy rear garden allowing for lovely summer breezes to enter.

residential.headline: A home with many options
residential.description:
Do you have a large family? Have you been hoping to find a home that will embrace all ages and stages of an extended family's life? Maybe you just like to accommodate visitors without your children giving up their room. This generous property has so many options.
Located in a quiet loop street in one of Belconnen's most desirable suburbs for families, this property has a living area of approx. 349sqm and is set on a parcel of land measuring approx. 1574sqm, with an Unimproved Capital Value of $564,000.
The rambling light-filled residence has been extended to provide even more accommodation than the 1972 floor plan offered. The first stage of the home, in mostly original condition, features beautiful hardwood flooring, a large living room opening to the dining room, a generous kitchen and family area with feature exposed ceiling beams and skylight, four bedrooms, a study, separate living areas and ducted gas heating.
The double storey extension has added a utility or guest bedroom upstairs and two more bedrooms, a bathroom and rumpus on the lower level. It has a lovely courtyard entry and a garage under the roofline. Shade sails at the front of the home assist in keeping the temperature comfortable.
The rear of the home has a deck and covered patio running along the length of the house and a grassed area with a separate, extra wide double garage that has automatic doors.
This generous family home is ready to occupy as is, yet still has the potential to add value and personal touches. Good schools and recreational areas nearby.

residential.headline: Private courtyard entry
residential.description:
There is no better way to describe this home than in the owner's words!
"What have I enjoyed about living here over the last 29 years?
In no particular order, it is the small cul-de-sac with friendly neighbours, where the children were safe, with no roads to cross to go to primary school.
When I return home after a busy day, open the gate and see the courtyard, I immediately feel relaxed.
We've enjoyed the wonderful flow of space from inside the living areas onto the deck and down to the pergola area. We have many happy memories of gatherings - from convivial dinners in the generous dining room, to an engagement party inside and out for 120 guests. We've had many leisurely winter lunches in the sun and balmy sunny evenings on our deck overlooking our colourful gardens.
On many occasions we have walked 400m to the back track to jog, walk or cycle. It is pleasant to stroll to the cafes at Hawker shops. Good schools and transport are close by too."
We appreciate the owner's input and hope buyers will also feel the warmth of this lovely family home.

A delightful and charming much loved home that has stood the test of time. In mostly original condition, this home is very comfortable and well maintained as is, or will interest those who might wish to renovate or extend.
Suitable for first home buyers, investors or down-sizers alike, the property has excellent security and is sheltered by awnings and mature shrubs. There is a verandah at the front and a secure patio at the rear. The lovely spring gardens are at their best this time of the year.
Downer is such a popular suburb with easy access to the ever-evolving Dickson Shopping centre, schools, playing fields and transport. Only minutes to the Farmers Markets or to Yowani Golf Club for golf, bowls or a tasty meal. Maybe you like the convenience of a quick getaway to the Federal Highway when heading north.

residential.headline: Generous proportions & flexible floor plan
residential.description:
Quality and style combine to bring to you an impressive new home of generous proportions, thoughtfully planned to suit most families.
This attractive home features solid bamboo flooring to the living areas with carpet to the bedrooms providing quiet comfort. For those who love segregated bedrooms, the master bedroom, with a walk-in robe and spacious ensuite, is situated at the front of the residence.
The open-plan kitchen and living areas capture northern light and provide ample space for family gatherings. Both the kitchen and dining areas open through bi-fold doors to a timber deck that is partially covered for seasonal outdoor entertaining or relaxing.
A modern, galley-style kitchen has ample cupboard space, gas cooking and an island benchtop. The fantastic walk in pantry is a chef's dream, with enough room to stock the cupboards for a month at least!
Centrally located, a separate rumpus or theatre room adds versatility to the home providing extra space for movie nights, a games room, a parents' retreat, a study, or all of the above.
Two bedrooms with full wall built-ins at the rear of the property share a two-way bathroom and provide flexibility for large or extended families. Children will love the shady park across the road.
If you are looking to secure a brand new four bedroom home, complete with floor coverings and block out blinds, inspection will not disappoint potential buyers. If you would like to be in your new home by Christmas, don't delay.

'Pretty as a picture' is the only way to describe this irresistible three bedroom ensuite free-standing townhouse.
The landscaped garden at the front invites you into this lovely home with features that others would find hard to match.
The tiled kitchen, meals and family room lead you out to a covered pergola perfect for a barbeque and entertaining. A segregated master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe is well away from the other two large bedrooms, both with built-ins. Living here is easy, safe and comfortable.

residential.headline: Reduced Price!
residential.description:
Conveniently located near the Town Centre, single level living, well maintained and a small complex of only eight! This special townhouse with a modern kitchen and bathroom is a pleasure to offer for sale.
The open-plan living area has laminate finished floating flooring and the two bedrooms are carpeted. The temperature is comfortable with a reverse cycle air conditioner in the living area, which adjoins the centrally located kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a bamboo bench.
There is internal access to a large single garage with shelving, plenty of storage space and a remote door. Extra parking in front of the garage is a bonus.
Westfield Belconnen, transport and the lake are only a short walk away making this location super convenient. Walk to the numerous offices nearby and save on parking fees.
This appealing home is vacant and ready for a new owner. Those looking for a larger than normal grassed courtyard will appreciate the veggie plot, established shrubs and space for children or pets.
Suitable for first home buyers, retirees, downsizers and investors alike. Be smart and take advantage of the reduced asking price.
*Renewed kitchen with pantry & Omega dishwasher *Euromaid stove *Solid bamboo kitchen bench top *Renewed bathroom, separate toilet *Reverse cycle airconditioner to living area *Laminate flooring to living room *Internal access to garage with remote door *Enclosed rear courtyard *Extra parking space in front of garage *Small complex of only 8 *Body Corporate fees $425.00 (approx) per quarter *General Rates $435.00 (approx) per quarter *Water Rates $152.00 (approx) per quarter

residential.headline: Spacious and appealing
residential.description:
A beautifully presented family home with loads of extras. Considered great value for money, this up-dated property is located in a quiet cul-de-sac in an elevated position.
Many appealing features include ducted evaporative cooling, ducted gas heating, ceiling fans to all generous bedrooms and ample cupboard space throughout the home.
The galley style kitchen that adjoins the dining and family area has a dishwasher, gas cooking facilities and a pantry. The bathroom has a bath and a shower recess as well as a separate toilet. There is an ensuite for the spacious and segregated main bedroom.
Keep an eye on the children playing or studying in the family room while preparing a meal. This family area progresses though a sliding door to a large timber deck, bringing the outside in. Great for those who like to entertain or just extra space for family outdoor living.
Adding to the attraction of this residence are landscaped grounds that include generous paved, off-street parking areas suitable for boat or caravan storage and good fencing. There is also a high carport at the rear of the property.
All in all, certainly one to add to your list to inspect and available for a quick settlement if needed.
* Separate formal lounge room * Carpet to lounge and bedrooms * Tiles floor to dining and family area * Segregated master bedroom with ensuite * Westinghouse gas cook top with range hood * Gas wall oven * Dishlex dishwasher * Ceiling fans to all bedrooms * Awnings to two bedrooms * Built-in robes to all bedrooms * Tastic to main bathroom * Ducted evaporative cooling throughout * Ducted gas heating throughout * Linen cupboard * Separate laundry with access to rear yard * Good fencing * Landscaped with paved off-street parking * High carport * Solar hot water * Living area approx. 154.6m2

residential.headline: Be the Belconnen Blockheads
residential.description:
Situated in a designated RZ2 area, this three bedroom privately built home in original condition offers exciting opportunities for renovators, investors and developers.
The generous, gently sloping 941m2 (approx) block provides a chance to create a dual occupancy, (subject to approval) or the current home provides a solid foundation for those who wish to experiment with their renovation skills.
Lease the home while you draw up your renovation/development plans
Located close to shops, schools, transport and the Belconnen town centre, this could be the end of your search.
* Hardwood flooring throughout * Original condition * Metal garage * Double carport * Contract for Sale and Building Report under "Documents" * Email agents for further information * Current tenant in the process of moving out

residential.headline: Generous block with off-street parking
residential.description:
What a pleasure it is to present this spacious family home for sale. The owners contracted Rawson Homes to build their home eighteen years ago and now find it is time to downsize. They have loved the house and the location.
The numerous benefits of this delightful property include ducted heating, two reverse cycle air conditioners, ample cupboard space throughout, separate living areas including a sunken lounge and dining room, a very large family room adjoining the kitchen and a drive-through double garage.
This is one of the larger blocks of land in Dunlop measuring approx. 716m2. There is vehicle access to the back yard from the side of the property as well as through the rear of the garage. Positioned at the side of a cul-de-sac means that there is off-street parking for visitors.
Being located in the original part of Dunlop this home, while close to the improved local shopping centre and primary school, is only a short drive to Kippax Fair and senior schools.
* Blackwood timber kitchen with good cupboard space * Wall oven and gas cook top with range hood * Ducted gas heating * Reverse cycle air conditioner to formal living * Reverse cycle air conditioner to family room * Ensuite to segregated master bedroom * Ceiling fan and mirror built-in robes to bedroom 1 * Built-in robes to bedroom 2 * Built-in robes to bedroom 3 * Linen cupboard * Extra large family room with space for a study * Main bathroom includes spa bath, shower recess and toilet * Garden shed * Double garage with remote doors and drive through access * Laundry to rear of garage * Concrete slab with pergola over and natural gas to BBQ * Gas hot water system * Security doors * Window locks * House living area approx. 143.12m2 * Garage approx. 32.82m2 * Verandah approx. 5.29m2
Vacant, cleaned and ready to occupy so don't miss it this weekend.

residential.headline: Excellent potential
residential.description:
If you have been searching for an opportunity to get a foot-hold in the popular suburb of Hawker then you would be wise to inspect this delightful home.
Partially upgraded and located in a quiet loop street, the home sits on a gently sloping block of approx. 825m2 in size with the opportunity to easily extend to the rear of the home. Some may want to build an entirely new home on the beautiful block of land just moments from the infants and primary school, complete with newly refurbished childrens' playground.
This compact and appealing north facing home is comfortably heated, has a renewed bathroom and three bedrooms one of which is currently used as a study. Paintwork and window treatments are modern and fresh.
The dining room leads conveniently through a sliding glass door to a pergola covered deck providing a sunny place to barbeque and enjoy outdoor living. The kitchen window overlooks the rear of the property suitably fenced for children and pets.
Hawker is such a family-friendly suburb with playing fields, walking trails, four levels of education, a shopping village and transport, all within easy walking distance.
Suitable for those starting out or winding down, we think this is one not to be missed.
* Ducted gas heating throughout * A reverse cycle air conditioner to bedroom 1 * Built-in robes to all bedrooms * Renewed bathroom * Separate toilet * Rear deck and pergola * Lock up metal garage on concrete slab * Carport * House approx. 105m2 * Block approx. 825m2

residential.headline: Comfortable family living
residential.description:
Located in one of Hawker's most popular streets, this appealing family home is brimming with sunlight. With spacious interiors, a versatile floor plan and ducted heating and cooling, the elevated home offers comfortable family living in a wonderful location.
Adjacent to a children's play ground and an easy stroll to four levels of education and playing fields, this is indeed the perfect opportunity to start the school year at your new address.
Young and the young at heart will enjoy the walking trails just a couple of minutes up the road, while walking the dog or simply enjoying the magnificent sunsets and Brindabella views.
Outside the secure rear yard is established with gorgeous shade trees offering a leafy outlook and privacy. There is even a fenced area with cover perfect for puppies.
Sadly for the owner it is now time to downsize. Reluctantly selling, although looking forward to another stage of life, the owner's change of life-style provides the ideal opportunity for tomorrow's family. The home has been well maintained however there are opportunities to renovate or even extend.
We hope to see you at our exhibitions.
* Modern kitchen with renewed wall oven and cooktop * Pantry and ample cupboards * Family room adjoins the kitchen * Separate lounge and dining rooms * Spacious entry * Built-in robes to bedrooms * Linen cupboard * Modern bathroom with bath and shower recess * Separate toilet * Generous bedrooms with ensuite to master * Ceiling fans to family and master bedroom * Downstairs - large laundry with bathroom * Internal access to rumpus/study or guest room * Extra shower and toilet next to laundry * Huge under house concreted storage areas * One remote controlled door to garage * Colorbond fencing

residential.headline: Land-size, luxury and location
residential.description:
Positioned in a desirable family locale with a design that is simple, functional yet distinctive, this tri-level residence is certainly not ordinary.
The iconic Pettit and Sevitt architect designed and extended, attractive home offers considerable appeal, with raked ceilings and timber windows. Natural sunlight and cross ventilation are used to maximum effect minimising heating and cooling costs.
There are surprises on every level. Stairs lead down to a generous formal living and dining area featuring gorgeous Jarrah flooring, full height windows and a northerly aspect. Upstairs is the parent's retreat with a spacious master bedroom and a lovely sunny and leafy outlook. An ensuite, another bedroom and a bathroom complete this upper floor.
You will discover more on the middle level where a reading room, a galley-style kitchen adjoins a spacious meals area and a generous family room leads out through glass sliding doors to a screened and pergola covered deck for easy outdoor living.
The two spacious bedrooms and another bathroom on the middle level are perfect for older children or guests and each enjoy a garden outlook. Explore the gardens and discover the various inviting nooks just perfect for quiet moments with a good book and your beverage of choice.
Beautiful interiors, bushy surrounds and moments from The Pinnacle nature park, schools, transport and the local shopping village, this home deserves to be seen. Indulge your senses and take a look.
* Miele glass hot plates
* Miele under bench oven
* Range hood and pantry
* Reverse cycle air conditioner in kitchen
* Ducted gas heating in original house
* In-slab heating in family room & extension

* Block size approx. 1269m2

residential.headline: Behind the garden wall
residential.description:
Secluded from the street by a private courtyard entry, this charming home has instant appeal from the moment you enter through the gate.
Settle in effortlessly to this attractive residence, combining functional features with classic styling for an easy-care indoor/outdoor lifestyle. The light and spacious formal living rooms enjoy a view of the front courtyard, while the family room opens to an expansive rear deck with a high pitched pergola. The rear bedroom is a generous size and opens onto the deck for easy access to the disability friendly ramp.
Whether raising a family or just needing a home on one level, this home has many attractions. Schools and transport are nearby, as well as parks, reserves and playing fields.
Hawker is popular for the four levels of education all within the suburb, the ever-evolving shopping village with its numerous amenities and restaurants, as well as being only a short drive to Belconnen town centre, Universities, Calvary hospital and the City.
* Built-in robes to all 4 bedrooms
* Linen cupboards
* Coat cupboard
* Gas hot water system
* Ducted gas heating
* Ducted evaporative cooling

Should appeal to most ages and stages of life.

residential.headline: Feature filled
residential.description:
There are so many features to this lovely home that must be inspected. Sitting in an elevated position with views to the mountains, in a quiet cul-de-sac, this property will suit those starting out or even professionals.
From the entry hall there is internal access to the double garage and on the right there are separate lounge and dining rooms with full length windows and insulated blinds.
The kitchen has been up-dated to provide excellent cooking facilities, a dishwasher, new bench tops and a large fridge space as well as filtered water on tap.
Adjoining the kichen is a very generous family room and this room opens to a small deck that overlooks a salt water solar heated relax pool, secluded and sheltered from the street by a courtyard wall.
Dunlop has parks, a pond, local shopping and is only a short distance to schools and major shopping centres.

residential.headline: Separate title townhouse
residential.description:
Looking for something a little bit different? Then book an inspection today to view this spacious and tastefully renovated, separate title, Willemsen design townhouse that is an entertainer's delight!
Situated in an elevated position on a generous corner block, this home is truly a unique residence offering three separate and functional outdoor areas comprising; a private rear courtyard with covered pergola, a charming and fully paved front entrance which easily accommodates a table setting where you can sit and take full advantage of its warm and sunny northerly aspect, plus a sizeable main outdoor area with a large deck, great for entertaining. The recently extended fence screening provides you with a wonderful sense of privacy and security.
Inside you will find two generous bedrooms, each boasting a fully renovated ensuite and built-in robes. Spacious open-plan living areas are simply delightful and allow flexibility of use. An up-graded kitchen adjoins the dining area and enjoys leafy garden views. There is a large separate laundry plus a generous rumpus room which was converted from a lock up garage.
This courtyard style home also offers an established and colourful low maintenance garden, a tandem carport, ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling, fresh paint, new carpet in both bedrooms and beautiful yet practical laminate finish floating flooring throughout the rest of the house, In addition, the windows are furnished with new slat blinds which complement the wonderful presentation of this delightfully unique home.
* NO Body Corporate fees to worry about
* Kitchen includes a 4 burner gas cooker
* Electric under bench oven
* Flued range hood & LG dishwasher

residential.headline: Townhouse in the Town
residential.description:
This smartly presented, two-storey townhouse is situated in the very heart of Belconnen, just a step away from all the facilities the town centre has to offer.
Featuring three bedrooms, ensuite, private upgraded courtyard, open-plan living, new carpet and paintwork, there is also a downstairs powder room and a single garage.
Full length windows in the living room allow light and sunshine to dance into the spacious home and capture the northerly aspect. Sliding doors open to a private courtyard with a perimeter garden kept fresh by a dripper watering system - perfect for a peaceful breakfast before heading off to the bustle of a busy working day.
A generous kitchen with built-in pantry and additional wall-mounted shelving will please the cook and there is plenty of storage throughout, including built-in robes in every bedroom and a deep under-stair cupboard.
Currently tenanted until January 2014 by excellent tenants who would like to stay, the home offers a superb investment or first home buying opportunity. You can save on petrol and parking fees and catch the express bus to work from the nearby bus station or stroll around Lake Ginninderra's leafy recreational areas.The Mall is close enough to be your local shopping centre and there are gyms, restaurants, cafes, bars, the University of Canberra and Belconnen's many offices all within walking distance.
This neat affordable townhouse has a sunny comfortable charm combined with the convenience and many benefits of an urban lifestyle. Priced to sell, it is well worth inspecting.

residential.headline: Superbly Located Townhouse
residential.description:
NEW PRICE! The owner is committed to selling this superbly located townhouse that is situated just a stroll away from both Jamison Shopping Centre and Belconnen's Westfield Mall. Neat and tidy, the original three bedroom home offers a perfect entry point into the real estate market, a wonderful investment opportunity or the chance of a 'lock-up and leave' lifestyle for the active retiree.
Entry to the home is past the generous front courtyard garden which is overlooked from the living room, kitchen and meals areas. As a result, the living areas are awash with light and have a delightful leafy outlook, wherever you sit. Raked ceilings in the split-level living areas give a sense of lofty spaciousness while the very functional kitchen offers plenty of storage and bench space and opens to the meals/dining area. A sliding door allows access to the front garden which is the perfect spot to place a table and chairs and soak up the sun or enjoy a peaceful drink.
An excellent investment property, the central location has been an additional drawcard for tenants over the years. Two of the three bedrooms have built-in robes and there is plenty of parking with a double carport and visitor parking dotted around the gardens beds in the pleasant, well-maintained complex. Freshly painted and with new carpet in the lounge room, the home offers a gross living area of approx. 107sqm, Body Corporate Fees of approx. $469 per quarter and an approx. rental value of $390-$400pw, making this delightful townhouse a very attractive prospect.
Main transport routes and bus services are close by; Belconnen High School is beside Jamison Shopping Centre, Macquarie Pre and Primary Schools are within walking distance and Belconnen town centre's many amenities are a short drive or walk away.
Setting up a new home interstate, the owner now wishes to focus locally, so No.21 is priced to sell. Don't miss out on a good buy!
-Delightful townhouse in ultra-convenient location -Light-filled living room with raked ceiling, ceiling fan, new carpet -Dining/meals area opening to kitchen, ceiling fan -Kitchen with electric wall oven, cook top, built-in pantry -Bedrooms 1 & 2 with built-in robes -Bathroom with shower & bath. Separate toilet -Laundry with external access -Electric wall heaters -Freshly painted -Double carport with storage shed at rear -Peaceful, well maintained complex -Walk to Jamison shopping centre & Belconnen High -Close to Belconnen town centre, Westfield Mall, pre & primary schools, main transport & bus routes

features.otherFeatures: close to schools, close to shops, close to transport

residential.headline: Rooms With A View
residential.description:
Sitting high in North Lyneham, on the edges of the nature reserve where the tracks meets the bitumen, this two bedroom tri-level townhouse offers you chic city living - with the bush as your playground.
Elevated in a sought-after area of the Inner North, close to Dickson's restaurants, the City and main transport routes, this delightful home makes a variety of easy living lifestyles possible.
The living is located over two levels with the lounge room opening to a huge balcony that provides the ideal outdoor entertainment area or play space. Morning sun will wash over any pot plants or veggie beds you may wish to have there, alternatively, it may simply brighten your day as you enjoy an al fresco breakfast while cooling down after your morning exercise along the reserve's ridge.
Opening from the lounge room, the family/dining area and kitchen overlook a charming Zen-like rear courtyard garden that offers another deliciously private sitting space. The functional kitchen has plenty of storage and work surfaces and adjoins the laundry offering even more storage and cupboard space.
Upstairs features two bedrooms. The main bedroom has access to the two-way bathroom and opens to another balcony where the sweeping outlook over North Canberra begs to be appreciated. Wake up to views of Mount Majura, watch the fireworks when EPIC erupts into celebrations or quietly appreciate the lights of the city as you sip your nightcap - it's all possible from here.
All rooms feature natural lighting throughout. The ground floor double garage has additional under-house storage space, internal access to the home and elevates the living spaces into secure privacy.
This distinctive and stylish home is a must-see for an executive couple, a small family or someone wishing to downsize without compromising on location or lifestyle.
-Beautiful Inner North townhouse -Light-filled interiors -Open floor plan with delineated living areas -Kitchen with gas cook top, electric oven, built-in pantry -Bedrooms 1 & 2 with built-in robes and stunning views -Main bedroom with bathroom access & balcony -Main bathroom with corner spa bath upstairs -Separate laundry & powder room downstairs -3 x reverse cycle air-conditioning units; ducted -Neutral tones & ample storage throughout -Generous double garage with auto door -Established, low maintenance private courtyard garden -Walk to Dickson's restaurants & shops -Stroll to Lyneham's shops & enjoy Tilley's divine coffee -Run/cycle/walk through the reserve -Direct bus transport to the City Centre -Close to Lyneham Primary & High Schools, Brindabella Christian & Daramarlan Colleges -Body Corporate Fees: $442 approx. per quarter

features.otherFeatures: balcony/patio/terrace, close to parklands, close to schools, close to shops, quiet location

residential.headline: At Home On Holyman
residential.description:
Tired of looking at yet another standard house? Are you looking for a four bedroom home? Then look at 8 Holyman Street.
This is an utterly delightful, engaging, upgraded home that ticks so many of the family-friendly boxes - solid home, large bedrooms, generous block, quiet street, cubby house, room to kick a ball, ride a bike or chase the pet around the yard - yet also speaks to the first home buyer/ young executive looking for a modern space in which to create their own lifestyle.
Generous, spacious and full of light thanks to the abundance of large windows, open-plan living and dining areas flow on into a newly updated kitchen. From there the living continues seamlessly outside to a large paved entertaining area where the fruit trees and Magnolia in full bloom are a visual feast, as tasty as the lazy Sunday brunch or family barbeque.
Newly installed gleaming bamboo flooring welcomes you into a home that also offers updated bathroom and laundry, fresh paintwork, ducted gas heating, new blinds and segregated bedrooms.
The leafy private yard wraps around the home offering veggie beds, fruit trees, established gardens and a generous double garage. Currently utilised as home office complete with another reverse cycle air conditioner, you decide how to use it - as a home gym, rumpus, studio or additional storage.
Close to a number of local shopping centres, Belconnen town centre and Lake Ginninderra's recreation areas, all ages and stages of public and private schooling are nearby. There's plenty of parking for cars and room for a trailer or caravan.
The owners will take away fond memories of the home they created and updated. They have loved living in such a peaceful convenient area. If you want to be as lucky, come and see 8 Holyman Street before the opportunity passes.
-Generous upgraded 4 bedroom 1 bathroom home -Light-filled interiors -Open floor plan with spacious lounge and dining areas -Newly upgraded kitchen with Bosch dishwasher, Westinghouse oven, built-in pantry, stainless steel appliances, garden/deck access -3 bedrooms with built-in robes -Bathroom with separate shower & bath. Separate toilet. -Updated laundry with storage space -Daikin inverter split systems in living area and garage. -Ducted gas heating. Tastic in bathroom. Gas hot water. -Contemporary, neutral tones & ample storage throughout -Quality fittings & fixtures -Crimsafe security doors. residential.headline: Decidedly Private, Deliciously Different
residential.description:
Are you looking for a home that's different - a three bedroom ensuite home with its own style and character? Do you appreciate privacy, a large secluded block and an ultra-convenient location? If this sounds like you, then come and explore at 11 Duigan Place.
Quietly tucked away in its own secret garden, the property's leafy driveway directs you to a discrete courtyard entrance. Entry to the home reveals it to be a spacious, light-filled and sunny oasis of calm.
Offering generous inter-connected living areas, upgraded kitchen, bathroom, ensuite and easy indoor/outdoor interaction, this is an already funky home, ripe for your imprint. The large living room overlooks a paved white-walled entertaining courtyard that shouts lazy summer lunches and family barbecues that don't want to end. The family/meals/kitchen areas are the busy centre of the home with bedrooms, main bathroom and garden access opening out from this hub. The kitchen is semi-partitioned from the family/meals area allowing the cook to still be part of the pre-meal conversation.
Outside, the gardens meander around the generous 965m² block with a mixture of established shrubs, natives, mature fruit trees and a veggie patch all irrigated from the rainwater tank. There's plenty of parking spaces plus room for a caravan, trailer, boat or even an extension.
Superbly located close to schools, bus stop, main transport routes and Belconnen town centre, Hawker shopping centre is just a stroll away.
Very few are lucky enough to live in the secluded enclave that is Duigan Place and the owner has appreciated every minute of its innumerable attributes. If you want to be the lucky one, be sure to inspect.

residential.headline: Uptown Living in Downer
residential.description:
New Price! Bright, fresh and designed to delight, the owners have loved living in this delightful three bedroom ensuite, dual occupancy home. Offered for sale by realistic vendors who are now ready to move on, the property represents a rarely available buying opportunity in a tightly held, competitive Inner North market.
Perfect for executive couples, small families or lock-up and leave downsizers, all the hard work has been done on a home that features effortless urban living in style and comfort.
Light and fresh, the warmth of polished Blackbutt timber flooring welcomes you to open living and dining areas, a neat user-friendly kitchen that lets the cook join in the meal time conversations and generous bedrooms segregated from the spacious living areas. Ducted gas heating ducted evaporative cooling and additional insulation in ceiling and walls keep the home comfortable with an EER of 6 while quality fixtures and fittings, additional storage, internal access to the garage and two additional parking spaces ensure low-maintenance convenience.
Outside the charming courtyard garden is a designed delight. Screening shrubs and shade sail keep the paved entertaining patio cool and private, offset against the calm of a stylish water feature, especially created from Sydney Sandstone.
In a superb location, the bus stop is nearby; cycle and walkways will have you in busy, developing Dickson's restaurants and shops in minutes. Close to the City, recreational facilities, nature parks and sporting facilities, schools, colleges, ANU and ACU are all nearby.
Free of strata management fees, this wonderful single-level townhouse alternative could be yours by Christmas - don't delay.
-Delightful, private dual occupancy home -Perfect for an executive/urban/downsizing lifestyle -Open plan living and dining areas -Plenty of large windows, glass door to courtyard area -Neat kitchen with gas stove, built-in pantry, dishwasher -Skylight in living area & main bathroom -Bedrooms 1 & 2 with built-in robes -Bedroom 1 with ceiling fan & ensuite -Spacious main bathroom, separate shower & bath -Ensuite with new shower screen -Tastics in bathroom & ensuite -Ducted gas heating & evaporative cooling -Double-backed insulating curtains & pelmets -Additional insulation in ceiling and external walls, including internal garage wall -Single garage with internal access -Additional storage at rear of garage -TransACT broadband enabled -Delightful, spacious private rear courtyard -Paved entertaining area with shade sail -Courtyard with mixture of lawn, garden/veggie beds -Units Plan 1076. residential.headline: Picture-Perfect on Pickles Street
residential.description:
Nestled behind a leafy front garden and with an attractive street presence, this superbly presented four bedroom ensuite family home is a calm, stylish haven.
There's a sense of a tropical island resort when you enter the home through a spacious living room. Plantation blinds line the windows, filtering the sunlight that dances throughout the living areas.
Open plan, the living rooms flow into the large family and sun room that can be segregated from the formal room - ideal for entertaining or hiding the toys when visitors arrive. The sun room's restful atmosphere provides a light-filled multi-purpose space and the leafy garden outlook makes it the perfect place to curl up with a book or watch a movie.
A modern upgraded kitchen is the hub of the home and features quality fittings, Caesarstone bench tops and ample storage. All the bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and the bathroom, ensuite and laundry have been stylishly renovated. There's ducted heating and cooling, new carpet, shade blinds and awnings - the list goes on.
Outside, there are no lawns to mow, just a wonderful mix of paved entertaining areas in the back yard, including a gas bayonet for the BBQ. Lush eclectically planned gardens with plants and trees provide shade and privacy. The front yard is the 'edible garden' planted with mandarin, blueberry, raspberry, pineapple guava and herbs, all deliciously blended with roses and shrubs.
The location is superb. Stroll to Hawker and Scullin shops, parks and primary schools. Belconnen town centre, Westfield Mall, recreation areas and employment centres are only a short distance away.
There is nothing to do in this utterly engaging home that is a tribute to the owners' care and attention. Simply move in and enjoy inner Belconnen living in a stylish home that combines usable panache with comfort!
-Immaculate & serenely spacious family home -Formal lounge & dining rooms with plantation shutters -New carpet in lounge room -Large family & sun room with back yard access -Renovated kitchen with Caesarstone bench tops -De'Longhi dishwasher, electric oven, gas cook top -ducted range hoo, skylight, built-in pantry -Segregated bedrooms, all with BIR's & carpet -Renovated bathroom & ensuite with heated towel rails & Tastics. -Renovated laundry with external access -Ducted gas heating & evaporative cooling -Security flyscreen doors -Back-to-base alarm, shade & awning blinds, ceiling fan -Plenty of storage, quality throughout, gas hot water -Gross living area approx. 146 sqm -Carport with storage at rear, shed, fenced pet area -Delightful gardens & paved entertainment areas,

residential.headline: Right on Riley
residential.description:
NEW PRICE! View and make an offer!
This property MUST be sold so if you are looking for an easy care, well designed townhouse to turn into your first haven, free from the rental treadmill, or you want a well-located investment property with a good return then come and inspect 4/4 Riley Close.
Investors will appreciate the convenient location and excellent return with great tenants paying $345 per week in rent - especially when you factor the asking price into the numbers. The lease expires in February 2015 and the tenants would like to stay - all of which makes this a very attractive investment proposition.
Equally attractive as delightful first home, downstairs offers the live-in owners an open tiled living area and a separate study or dining room. The generous kitchen with quality appliances and plenty of storage options, has an adjacent meals area and access to the low maintenance, fenced rear courtyard. There is also a powder room and internal access to the garage.
Upstairs, both the generous bedrooms, with built-in robes, are carpeted and have ensuite bathrooms.
Adjacent to the small 'Platypus' shopping centre, with supermarket and cafe, perfect for a coffee on the way to work, the location means it is easy to access main transport routes and bus services. The golf course and Gungahlin town centre are conveniently nearby.

residential.headline: Don't Dilly-Dally
residential.description:
Offering approximately 84sqm of living and larger than some townhouses, this stylish ground floor, two bedroom unit represents value for your money in every sense. Priced to the market and an unusually spacious apartment with segregated bedrooms and laundry - no squeezing the washing machine into the bathroom - the modern kitchen and bathroom have been renovated to a high standard with contemporary fixtures, fittings and clever designs that maximise useability.
A fabulous footstep into the real estate market, the apartment features a generous, open living room flowing to an equally generous light-filled kitchen and meals area. With leafy courtyards at both the front and back of the apartment and floating timber-style floors connecting the rooms, the flow between the living areas is fresh and highly appealing. Along with the benefits of being single level on the ground floor, the unit is an ideally situated and presented downsizer close to the local supermarket and bus stop. Astute investors will note the convenient location, maintenance-free presentation, reasonable body corporate fees and an approx. gross yield of 5%.
Located in a small, peaceful complex almost mid-way between Kippax Fair shopping centre and Belconnen town centre, Latham Primary School, Neighbourhood Oval and Umbagong District Park are all close by as are major transport routes.
Neat and sweet, this apartment feels more like a house than a unit thanks to its spaciousness and segregated living areas. Don't dilly dally - this is worth inspecting.

residential.headline: Fit Into Florey
residential.description:
Tucked away in a sleepy cul-de-sac and part of a sweeping semi-circle of spacious homes, this four bedroom ensuite property is the house you will want your family to come home to.
An immaculate street presence draws you in past a stencilled driveway, awning blinds and neatly trimmed shrubs through to a wide welcoming entrance way. Inside, large living areas flow into each other in a beautifully presented arch that sweeps from formal lounge room to dining room and around to the kitchen and family room.
Neat but not precious, the home's family appeal is obvious. There's scope for the rough and tumble of children's play to spill out to the huge rear entertaining area and garden from the family area room while the adults enjoy peace and quiet in the light-filled dining and lounge rooms. A generous kitchen, located between family, dining and outdoor living areas, makes it easy for the cook to be at the centre of any activity.
More highlights include bedrooms segregated from the living areas, all with built-in robes, separate toilet and bathroom, quality fixtures and fittings, ducted gas heating and ceiling fans in most rooms.
The large double garage, currently utilised as a very well set up home office complete with ducted heating, has plenty of storage options.
Outside, a huge covered patio provides fabulous outdoor living. There's almost an outdoor kitchen with the sink, barbeque wall-mounted television and more. All you have to do is bring your own pool table and friends to enjoy the fabulous all-ages playground that is the back yard. Vegetable beds, shade trees, garden beds, room to run, jump, play basketball and park the trailer are all here, bounded by secure Colorbond fencing.
So close to Belconnen Mall, you can walk there without crossing a road thanks to an underpass. Florey shops and primary school are nearby and main transport routes are easily accessed. If you want to fit into Florey - act fast!

residential.headline: The Present in Page
residential.description:
Life in the present is on offer in this chic, modern three bedroom ensuite townhouse that's perfectly situated for an urban lifestyle, just a stroll away from Belconnen's many inner city amenities.
Contemporary and convenient, the home is only a couple of years old and is in pristine condition. Cleverly designed to ensure maximum comfort and useability, the open plan living and dining rooms are downstairs, separated in the middle by a sleek, shiny kitchen.
The home's fresh, clean lines and sense of space are enhanced by the light flooding into the home. North-facing glass doors in the dining area and generous living room windows allows light to meet light and wash over the entire floor, highlighting the style, decor and neat functionality.
Upstairs the carpeted bedrooms have built-in robes with the main bedroom enjoying a walk-in robe and ensuite. All the modern comforts are here from the reverse cycle air conditioners to the water tank through to the external adjustable shade blinds on the rear bedroom windows.
Outside a neat rear courtyard garden has an entertaining area and enough garden to keep a green thumbed buyer happy. Just the right size, it would be unlikely to become an on-going chore or something that would stop you from going away for a while. The single garage has an automatic door, internal access and a parking space at the front.
Moments from main transport routes and the bus station, everything is on the doorstep here. On the inside there's a smart, tranquil home whose approx. 100sqm of immaculate living space will accommodate your lifestyle, here and now. Be sure to inspect.

residential.headline: The Ground Floor Penthouse
residential.description:
Genuine lakeside locations in Canberra are still a sought-after commodity and those which offer similarly rare attractions on the inside, together with sumptuous fittings and a gorgeous outlook, are jealously guarded by those in the know.
So aficionados are likely find their heart racing over this remarkable ground-floor three bedroom apartment that has all the credentials of a penthouse; an extraordinary view across Lake Ginninderra, a superb wrap-around deck and an open plan living area that will make you feel the outdoors is all part of an adjoining room.
If your idea of heaven involves waking up with sunlight streaming in from across uninterrupted views of the lake, or winding down at day's end on an enormous balcony as the sun disappears over the horizon, this is a property that's undoubtedly worthy of serious consideration.
Consider just a few of the extras that will leave your friends open-mouthed:
- A segregated oversized master bedroom with a decadent ensuite and a new wall mounted TV. - The third bedroom has been reconfigured to double as a home cinema, including a brand-new state-of-the-art HD ceiling projector and 100% block-out blinds. - A main living area and lifestyle space that really must be seen to be appreciated, with a wow factor that's likely to leave you speechless. - A gourmet kitchen to satisfy your senses even before you've turned on its Miele induction stovetop. Effortlessly chic with an island bench that keeps you in touch with guests and the view, the joie de vivre and esprit of it all is practically guaranteed to add inspiration to every meal. - A gorgeous main bathroom that seems to be the size of a bedroom. - Internal window treatments that are all quality roller-blinds to ensure privacy and solitude. - Extensive LED down lights offer soft, energy-efficient lighting. - A wrap-around balcony that's so integrated it will feel like a natural extension of the living room. Zone out the cares of life momentarily as you gaze over the lake, or host the party of the year with friends who may never want to leave. - 132sqm of living inside plus an additional 88sqm of balcony outside. - Two dedicated car spaces in a secured parking area . - Equidistant between Belconnen's shopping Mall, the entertainment strip of Emu Bank and the tracks that circumvent Lake Ginninderra, it's a property where changing your lifestyle is as simple as changing direction each morning.
If you have any questions, this superb home is bound to have the answers, and I'm more than happy to arrange private viewings. Feel free to call today.

This home not only offers peace and tranquility outside but inside also, with four segregated living areas for you to quietly collect your thoughts after a tough day at work or school or just be able to relax in the established gardens around your new abode.
With ample built in robes to all bedrooms you have the bonus here in this home of a segregated good sized master bedroom with ensuite tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the family. .
The generously sized kitchen and adjoining meals area allows you to spend real time with loved ones over a meal or be able to share stories of the days adventures with one another. Be able to look forward to either sharing a cuppa in the busy parts of the day or the quiet moments of the evening just by yourself after all the hustle and bustle has subsided.
This is a home that will always have the option of taking any conversation outdoors for a barbeque, to enjoy warmer weather in the secure backyard allowing kids to play amongst the beautifully landscaped gardens.
Once upon a time a pool previously existed on the property awaiting each day the laughter of kids home from school or for the bigger kids amongst us. So the opportunity clearly exists once again if you choose to put another pool in for the future summers ahead .
Its peaceful garden and superb private location will greet you upon your very first inspection and having such close proximity to a number of schools like St Monica's and Miles Franklin (which are so very near) will be tempting if you have youngsters for school in 2014.

The number 8 is a lucky omen in some cultures and this lovingly renovated three bedroom family home at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac in Charnwood may help explain why.
For anyone looking for a superior quality property with an affordable price tag in a high growth area, it's a property offering features that are likely to suit a vast range of buyers at every stage in life.
Beyond its rendered exterior and the warm and sunny north-facing entry, you'll find a single-level floor plan highlighted with brand new carpets and fresh interior paintwork.
Tasteful living spaces will adapt easily to your own personal decor while, after hours, the ample bedrooms offer relaxed retreats for the entire family, tucked away in the heart of the home's peaceful location.
Grassy yards at the front and back will ensure your children or pets have plenty of room to explore and play, with the enclosed rear yard also providing a covered entertaining area for adults to unwind with friends and family around a BBQ lunch or al fresco meal.
There's also a double garage with remote access and an attached workshop, all cleverly fitted with alarms to match the protection of the home's security system.
Convenience is extraordinary, too, with adjacent walkways leading directly to the Charnwood playing fields in one direction or the well-catered local shopping centre in the other. Public transport and ovals are also within easy reach.
