residential.headline: KING OF THE HILL
residential.description:
Sublimely positioned in an elevated location to take full advantage of the magnificent views across the valley that it presides above, this four bedroom ensuite home will take your breath away as you arrive and proudly overlooks your new domain. Let your new home be the envy of your friends and family as King of the hill is a proudly apt description for this remarkable lifestyle property.
Private and secluded away from the everyday madness of modern day living, this amazing home will be a sanctuary for you to come home to at the end of the busy working day. If your home needs to be both retreat and castle then you will be very hard pressed to find this again in the years, or even possibly decades to come.
Boasting without shame a stunning kitchen with stainless steel appliances it includes such features as ; Caesar stone bench tops, 5 panel induction cook top and a Miele double oven for easy entertaining for one or wonderfully for an entire gathering of the clan. The extensive outdoor entertaining terrace will make casual meals and soirees relaxed and enjoyable while the formal dining and living rooms can be used for more official get-togethers with family and friends.
You will never tire of the outstanding panoramic views from every vantage point at the front of this prominent home, and waking to the sounds of bird life and sunlight streaming in from every bedroom window will be like waking up in some eco resort in a private retreat. The spacious master bedroom alone is complete with walk-in robe room and just becomes you forward into the ensuite with its generous vanity area.
There are three additional double bedrooms that overlook the view as well and are both extremely generous in size. The fourth bedroom is currently configured as an enormous study includes custom built bookcases and shelving and could easily be utilised as a private comfortable fourth bedroom or guest accommodation if required with its north orientation.
There is an abundance of light throughout the entire home with extensive use of extra-large windows that give an amazing outlook . Your year round comfort is ensured with the ducted electric heating and cooling system as well as a oversized Coonara slow combustion wood fire heater in the family/meals area.
The current owners have made extensive use of the natural bush rock from around the property to encompass the home with lovely low maintenance garden beds with lots of native plants and fruit trees which has taken years of work every weekend to get just right with location orientation and placement to give the surrounding gardens an amazing feel of care and dedication for any gardener .
Car accommodation is provided by a double garage situated under the house, a separate metal garage that will easily accommodate two large vehicles and the extra 'big boys toys' that you will probably acquire along with this lovely country lifestyle.
The storage capacity under the home is enough to delight every person whom gets to see it . The word wow comes straight to mind alone in its size height and capacity. So if you need to lay down a couple of thousand bottles of wine for a few years or mind an entire household worth of things for friends or family then here it is for you to appreciate .
A concrete and secure dog enclosure, chicken pen, 20,000litre water tank, 2 x dams are just a few of the bonuses that are included in this amazing property. We simply can't add them all to the advertising as this description would become a manuscript and would spoil the surprises here - so don't delay your inspection, as this property is sure to appeal to those with an eye for quality and value.
As Yul Brynner said in "The King and I" ... "Is good to be King ".

Come on up! In the rear yard the panoramic views across the entire Canberra valley are nothing less than you'd expect in a location of this quality - consistently majestic and constantly uplifting throughout the seasons, they're a perfect backdrop to keep your friends and family spellbound over BBQs and evening soirees. residential.headline: Indugle All Your Senses
residential.description:
Sight, sound, smell, touch and taste - make sure you bring all of your senses to this extraordinary home on the upper slopes of Pearce because they're all likely to go into overload.
The feast for your eyes starts as soon as you arrive, with glorious northerly views from the kerbside that stretch across the valley towards Black Mountain, while your ears are sure to recognise the leaves rustling, the bird songs and the quiet. The smells belong to the roses and superb foliage surrounding the property, while the touch is all part of the flourishes dotted around the landscaping such as the Japanese Zen gardens at the rear. And finally the taste is what awaits inside - a superb, naturally relaxing interior unashamedly designed to monopolise the views and maximise your whole family's lifestyle.
The home's entry reveals a superb lower living room in warm hues and textured walls, radiating out to a decadent sunroom, a master bedroom and ensuite as well as an additional large bedroom along the eastern edge. Just upstairs is the home's real heart - a dining room, family room, outer deck and magnificent kitchen forming a close-knit grouping of everyday needs. The kitchen includes an island bench, beautiful bench tops and classic cookware with windows to the views from three vantage points. Meals can be served in the formal dining area on cooler evenings or enjoyed just outside on the covered deck on warm Summer nights, lazing around on soft furnishings and soaking up the breathtaking light-show.
The family sleeping quarters link off an upper corridor - two inviting night-chambers separated by a fabulous bathroom and the last of the home's five bedrooms completing the tour over near the home's front entrance. But it's probably the rear yard where you'll hear the biggest sighs and guarded whispers among other hopeful buyers - it's a gently sloping plunge leading to a large in-ground pool that looks too good to be real, all surrounded by lush gardens, trees and stone retaining walls. But then it all starts to make sense when you understand that the current owner is a professional landscaper who has prided himself on the planning, nurturing and layout of his family's personal retreat.
Standing on the grass cushioned lawn and looking back over the pool towards the home's regal outline, it's hard not to weigh up all of its advantages. Off-street parking that would cater for ten vehicles with ease, first-class landscape surrounds and a blissful home interior. Let the final decision be guided by the only sensation you have left intact - it's just common sense.
FEATURING:
Outstanding elevated block of 1261m2 in the height of sought after Pearce Impressive UCV of $633,000.00 Classic five bedroom with ensuite, home. High ceilings in a home that enjoys split level living with separated bedrooms. Family room and meal /dining areas, directly from the kitchen. Generous chef level styled kitchen, with modern granite bench tops, and superb storage space. Stunning Falcon stove and oven that our owners love, that is staying with the property. Extensive consistent polished hardwood flooring throughout. Fireplace wood heating with air conditioning and central heating. Light filled sunroom to enjoy come the cooler winter months and a comfortable entertaining covered timber deck. Very comfortable, in-floor heating, in the kitchen and bathrooms areas.

residential.headline: RAPT FOR CHRISTMAS
residential.description:
Your wish list for a new home might be the perfect yuletide ribbon to tie around this delightful four bedroom, two bathroom gift in Higgins, just a push-bike ride from two grassy ovals and a Sunday stroll from the local shops.
Single level throughout, and thoughtfully extended to provide generous living areas for adults and children alike, its warm brick exterior is matched by an equally inviting interior that will have you stretching out or cuddling up in plenty of time for the New Year.
A large slice of its massive appeal is the open plan layout and the reassuring line of sight out to the backyard lawn over a broad covered deck/verandah, ensuring your kids and pets are always on the visual radar while you're entertaining your friends and family inside. And with such an impressive family room, kitchen and dining room, entertainment is likely to be an indulgence you'll want to embrace.
The treats extend further, too, with all your other creature comforts assured by the home's gas heating, evaporative cooling and extensive insulation underfoot and overhead - it's even Foxtel-ready for the movie or sports buffs who want to settle back over the break.
In the yard you'll find an established garden, a cubby-house and a lawn for this Summer's family cricket matches while, for the adults, there's a double-size carport that's also adaptable for storage, as well as a rainwater tank and a boundary-line protected by Colorbond fencing.
There's even an Oak in the front yard so it's fair to say this is a perfect family Christmas present that's already under the tree.
House:
Size 163sqm approx Four bedrooms, two bathrooms Extended brick home Gorgeous kitchen and open plan living room Generous family room and dining room Entertaining lifestyle home with covered balcony/deck Renovated modern bathroom Insulation in ceiling and floor Two hot water systems, Bosch instant for the bathroom and another dedicated to the kitchen Gas heating Evaporative cooling Dishwasher and gas trivet cook top
Yard:

residential.headline: It's the "Ohh!" in O'Connor!
residential.description:
Beguiling, becoming, bewitching be quick! Every so often a property comes up for sale that surprises even long-term Canberrans and reveals a hidden enclave within our beautiful city - this grand 5-bedroom structure and its gorgeous surrounds at the cul-de-sac end of Yapunyah Street are just such a find. Sited on a delightfully elevated undulation in the centre of O'Connor, it's a 1260sqm block of land that might have been a favourite vantage point for photographers in the early 1960s, with its sweeping southern views across the undivided valley that took in everything from Mt Ainslie to the Brindabellas. Those views weren't lost on the architects, who designed a superb home to take full advantage of them out of every window as well as from a long entertaining patio at the entrance that spans half of the home's breadth. Stepping inside doesn't diminish the treats either - a classically spacious high-ceiling layout of enormous living rooms overlooks lush gardens on one side and yet still frames Parliament House's flagpole on the other. There's a large kitchen and family area that leads out to a bricked summer courtyard as well as five colonial-sized bedrooms, some of which even feature transom swivelling glass windows above the doors for added room ventilation. Internal access to a downstairs retreat opens up an entirely new space that's perfect as a teenager's room, a study or even a professional office, and there's also a surplus of walking-height storage facilities under the family room's floorboards.
The rear yard offers a gardener's smorgasbord in every sense, with a myriad of interesting courtyards, niches and structures that have hosted herb gardens and vegetable plots over the years, together with a twisting knotted vine forming a fence-line that's both instantly fascinating and naturally unique. Flanked by trees, shrubs and greenery on every side, the entire garden is a wonderland for kids, pets and adults alike.
In the front yard you'll discover a looped driveway together with additional guest parking on the eastern side while, along the western boundary, there's a green belt and walking path meandering through the suburb.
Be beguiled and bewitched - but, above all, be quick - especially when the owners have asked us to accommodate every sales enquiry over the Christmas and New Year festive period. The possibilities for improvement, modernisation and restyling seem limitless but only one fortunate buyer can inherit them all - and, if history repeats itself again, another opportunity may not occur for another half-century.
Features :
Classic 5 bedroom ensuite 1960s home Block size of approx. 1260 sqm Elevated home at the end of a cul-de-sac and siding reserve UCV of $762,000 Home size of 200sqm approx. Ducted electric heating, transcom window venting over doors Classic high ceilings and spacious rooms, all freshly painted 3 separate large living spaces Lower level home office, study, music room or retreat accessed by an internal staircase. Walking-height wine cellar / storage under house Large established garden with enormous potential Large balcony and formal entertaining areas around the home Looped driveway and guest parking

residential.headline: Environmentally Green at " the Fair ".
residential.description:
Lovers of modern styling and low-maintenance living will adore this divine three bedroom terrace home hugging Canberra's established inner north, close to the surrounding mountain bike areas and walking tracks.
This cleverly laid-out lifestyle property is roughly 4 years old and has a property depreciation schedule completed by the current owners for the years ahead; year 3 depreciation here for example was $9,503.00.
The interior is equally impressive, with a captivating entry opening up light-filled interiors that are divided into downstairs living areas and upstairs sleeping quarters. On the lower level the pristine presentation includes quality carpeting, unobtrusive electric heating for warmth on those cold Winter mornings and reverse cycle cooling when you need a cool environment. These gorgeous living areas also open out to a private, enclosed courtyard that's bound to inspire al fresco dining and Summer soirees.
The positioning of this quality property was a significant factor when the current owner purchased it. Sitting adjacent to manicured community gardens, it gives a sense of individuality and extra space that will be both appreciated and desirable.
A staircase leads up to the evening accommodation, where you'll find a master bedroom overlooking and two family bedrooms, all of which include built-in robes.
The beautiful finishes and quality fixtures are the other features likely to leave a strong impression. Bosch appliances, an integrated dishwasher and an open plan kitchen with plenty of storage and preparation space is perfect for those that love cooking and the adjacent dining room will keep the chef involved in the conversation throughout the meal.
This community title property presents extrordinary value for buyers - roughly 8 kilometres from the city, only minutes away from Gungahlin and Dickson and a surprisingly short drive to the airport, it also enjoys the convenience of local schools, parklands and Watson's local shopping centre.
Three spacious bedrooms with built-in-robes Large master bedroom Convection radiators and reverse cycle airconditioning Additional powder room on lower level A generous and private courtyard with established gardens Family room/meals area off kitchen Modern kitchen with Bosch stainless steel appliances Stainless steel dishwasher Abundance of cupboard and storage space Internal laundry Open plan design Single garage with separate street access Energy efficient solar gas hot water system Walking distance to local schools, Watson shops, walking trails, playing fields, reserves and Mount Majura Easy walk to EPIC, Farmers Markets and transport Administration and sinking funds are $2889,60 pa.

residential.headline: Chic & Fashionable
residential.description:
If you have just spent the better part of the last few months of your life, every day, on the internet, and half your weekends looking for that one property that is both individual and has a wow factor, then finally here it is !
Your new home at 78 Buckingham Street, has been cleverly upgraded to include a high standard both internally and externally.
Internally, this home boasts impressive features including floating timber flooring and new carpets throughout all areas.
The modern open plan kitchen would be a stand out for any gourmet lover, with full stainless steel appliances, integrated and ducted rangehood, 900 mm wide gas cooktop and 900 mm wide electric oven. This kitchen equally lends itself, both to internal entertaining as well as cleverly connecting to the outdoor covered entertaining space, featuring beautifully polished concrete flooring under an extensively protected pergola.
Feature and down lighting, work seamlessly to create a cool designer mood throughout,and enhance the homes overall appeal.
An LG 60" HD wall mounted flat screen TV features in the lounge room and will remain for the next owner to enjoy.
Separate living spaces are defined by a meals / family room, adjacent to the kitchen and a seperate formal dining and lounge room.
Both bathrooms feature quality fixtures and floor to ceiling tiling that's sure to impress.
Your Master bedroom showcases a Walk in Robe and well presented Ensuite. Whilst near by, Bedroom two and three house built in wardrobe spaces.
The garage features a full remote controlled tilt a lift garage door and internal access, with 2.7 metre high ceiling clearance, will surely satisfy everyones extensive storage needs.
The established landscape gardens, were cleverly created to maximise the overall appeal of the property, whilst minimising the amount of maintenance necessary.
All of these outstanding attributes explain quite simply why Buckingham's chic and fashionable appeal will be the stand out property you will surely not want to miss.

residential.headline: 14 "CHEZ MARIYA"
residential.description:
CHEZ MARIYA 4 BEDROOMS, 3 LIVING SPACES, 2 BATHROOMS 1 CHANCE When an owner loves their home enough to christen it with a family name cast in wrought iron, it's not hard to imagine the extra love and care that must have been showered across the entire property and grounds. And, after many years of devotion, the legacy of Chez Mariya is now available for adoption into the care of another equally-doting owner.
The fabulous position on a one-way street in the upper reaches of Red Hill and its rock solid double brick construction are just the external attractions but, inside, you'll find a four bedroom, three living space, two bathroom layout that's not only inviting but also adaptable for renovators and visionaries.
The homes updated kitchen sits at the home's heart, forming a natural hub for day-to-day activity that controls the pulse of movement from the front door to rooms at the rear. Stylish and spacious, it has generous stone benchtops, pristine cupboard storage and a casual meals setting that makes conversation easy for everyone while the chef cooks up a storm. The kitchen also adjoins the wrap-around living areas and radiates out into each of the bedrooms.
Alterations over the years have given the home both modern touches that complement the charm of the 60s, but it's also a home that opens up endless possibilities with some thought and expertise - not to mention the potential to start completely afresh and create your own castle in the clouds.
But its enviable location across the road from four pillars of Red Hill education is something you'll never want to change. Imagine Montessori, a specialist French school, Possum Magic and Red Hill Primary all within a minute's walk, as well as nearby Boys Grammar just a short drive away. It's a parent's nirvana for anyone who believes in the value of good education.
Inspections are not only encouraged, but should be essential, for astute purchasers. Private viewings for busy people can be readily accommodated.

residential.headline: Blink and you'll miss the chance
residential.description:
Homes with great presentation, a single-level floorplan and a quiet location rarely last long in today's market - but when you discover it's also got quality fittings and a realistic price-tag you'll need to hope your voice is loud enough to be heard over the excitement. The open-plan living/dining and kitchen areas underline the relaxed ambience of the entire dwelling, where inviting retreats and functional rooms flow naturally between each other with a minimum of fuss. It's also contemporary and fresh, with a 6-star energy rating to ensure your creature comforts as well as neutral decor that's sure to complement everyone's taste in furnishings. Each of the bedrooms has built-in robes and the master shares a second entry to the main bathroom to provide a very effective faux-ensuite. The main living area also spills out to a rear garden that's both spacious and private, lined with walls, fencing and hedges to provide a grassy area large enough for pets or child's play as well as a very pleasant BBQ area within metres of the kitchen. Purchased only a few years ago as a low maintenance, easy lifestyle home for an elderly owner, it's an ideal home for buyers at almost every cycle of life - from first-timers or professional couples to young families and early retirees. And of course investors will be especially keen to attract such a wide range of demographics too. If you need more convincing, there's even a green belt across the road where you can take leisurely rambles along a myriad of paths or simply watch your kids run, kick and play to their heart's content.

Set on a split level layout and positioned just footsteps from a green belt and cycle path, the interior features four generous bedrooms, including a segregated and impressively-proportioned master and second bathroom complete with spa bath and a purpose-built home office with professional joinery. Flowing interiors and a functional kitchen meld into the multiple living areas to round out a remarkable family residence that can easily accommodate a range of family needs, ages and lifestyles.
With a large double garage, terraced grounds and a covered entertaining area as well as thoughtful touches like a stencilled driveway.
Even the backyard is ready with space for those winter vegetables to be planted and the much appreciated garden shed to look after all the things that go with your precious garden and Vegetables through the seasons ahead.
The position is ideal, too, only a short stroll to local schools and with easy access to shops and bus routes. Unique, contemporary and carefully crafted throughout for indoor or outdoor entertaining, it's a property that also offers style, privacy, grace and taste wrapped up in a low-maintenance environment.

residential.headline: Dollar wise Clever Cents
residential.description:
Fall instantly in love with the different layout and warmth of this very cleverly designed split level home. Well orientated on the block, you'll appreciate the sun filled north facing living areas on these cool winter days, and get to appreciate the bonus features such as the wrap around easy care gardens in the coming warmer months.
A well designed kitchen with large pantry makes cooking for a family and entertaining a breeze, be it in the busy times of breakfast to those slower times around dinner when everyone finally gets the chance to relax together. Two private courtyards flow seamlessly off the dining room, making entertaining easy inside as well as outside.
Modern features are expected these days as standard when you buy a home like this one, so items on your "must have list" are already taken care of here such as evaporative cooling, gas heating and a dishwasher. Enjoy the benefits of having the NBN at your disposal, as well as near new kitchen appliances.
The home has been freshly painted and brand new carpet installed, giving this property an almost brand new feel to it.
A lock up carport with ready to use workshop space awaits your car and bicycles, and additional storage sheds are a bonus for the avid gardener and handy person. The eco-friendly benefits are evident here in the multiple water tanks with pumps around the house, ensuring your garden never runs out of water in the summer months.
Gas heating and evaporative cooling makes this a truly comfortable home that will welcome you every single time.
A great residence like this is often sought but rarely found. When you are away on holidays you will be counting the days before you are back in the comfort and ease of your own lovely home.
Positioned commandingly at the entrance of a very tightly held and friendly cul-de-sac, you will appreciate the benefits of a very short walk to two great playgrounds, nearby shops, bike paths and schools in the immediate area.

residential.headline: HAPPINESS & HALCYON DAYS
residential.description:
Price guide: $550,000 plus
Put a halo around this superb four bedroom, ensuite family home in one of Macgregor's premier streets, sited opposite Mt Goodwin reserve and enjoying panoramic mountain views to the south and west.
Privately built and held by the same family for over 32 years, its internal split level floor plan and inviting garden surrounds have been designed to ensure a lifestyle that's delightfully Australian - with plenty of space on the inside and an exterior deck at the rear that's bound to have you enjoying BBQs, afternoon naps and sunset drinks throughout the warmer months.
As soon as you enter the front door the full length windows and cathedral ceilings to the rear offer an abundance of natural warmth and light and the split level configuration neatly separates the living areas and evening accommodation.
Each of the bedrooms lines the upper level, culminating in the master at the end which includes a walk-in robe and ensuite.
The lower level is just as well thought out, with the living room leading into the dining room and kitchen and then further to the laundry. The kitchen/dining even allows enough room for a casual meals areas, too, as well as a study nook and moveable island bench. For your creature comforts there's ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling as well as numerous ceiling fans dotted throughout.
Underfoot there's an abundance of storage and, for your cars there's remote controlled entry to the double enclosed carport as well as extra purpose-built off-street parking facilities.
From the rear deck the fully landscaped and easy care gardens are an absolute delight, including a private courtyard for al fresco meals, plus terraced garden beds and established greenery that are all enclosed by Colorbond fencing. Set the kids free to play with your pets and enjoy the grassy slopes with privacy and security - there's ample room for a cubby house or play equipment too. At the front there's a drip irrigation system for 'set and forget' gardeners and its glorious gums and natural flora make it a joy all year round.
With the nearby walking tracks, a children's playground and a reserve directly opposite, it's a fabulous opportunity that may not last until Auction day. Weigh up the positives for too long and you may have to join a queue. Best not delay - call for an inspection today.
Additional features include:

residential.headline: THINK OUTSIDE THE SQUARE
residential.description:
Queanbeyan's close proximity to Fyshwick, Canberra airport and the Parliamentary Triangle make it an easier commuting distance than many suburbs within the Territory and this gorgeous top-floor, two bedroom/two bathroom in a fresh complex adds another attraction. Sited on the western edge of the town, with easy access to Canberra Avenue, it was built in 2010 to the standards you expect in modern design, featuring open pathways and garden beds at the entrances as well as underground parking for your vehicle.
Inside the secure apartment there's a fabulous open-plan living/dining room and kitchen that adjoins a large outside balcony through expansive floor-to-ceiling windows. Adaptable and full of light, they provide a combined internal/external living area that will quickly become the natural centre of your weekend life. Radiating off the corners are two inviting bedrooms separated by the main bathroom; the master also features an ensuite.
The convenience to facilities isn't limited to Canberra either. You'll also find excellent shopping nearby in the township's main retail areas, as well as the local school and transport within walking distance.
Previous rental return was $440 per week which makes this is an oustanding opportunity for home buyers and investors alike. Buy it for yourself now and rent later, or become a landlord immediately and keep it as an investment. Think outside the square and consider what's just over the border.

residential.headline: THINGS ARE LOOKING UP
residential.description:
Let your inspiration lead you where it will at this delightful 3-bedroom address in Scullin, offering an inviting street appeal and enormous potential inside to update, upgrade, upsize and up-value.
Previously tenanted by long-term tenants for over 10 years, it's a well-loved home that's been kept in excellent condition throughout, displaying all of the charm and characteristics of earlier decades while still offering an exciting opportunity to make improvements.
The home's layout is both logical and adaptable, starting with a classic living room at the front that leads through into a dining room and kitchen that gazes out across the yard - all bound to tease home renovators with possibilities. The three bedrooms are out of sight at the home's other end - private enough to be well away from visitors and guests and yet neatly clustered together for caring parents to nurture the children overnight.
The large, level rear yard outside is mottled with shafts of sunlight and shady trees, as well as established greenery and a concrete slab that may be ideal for an additional shed or child's playhouse. There's plenty of room for pets and vegetable gardens and, with approval, the possibility of expanding or extending.
Sited directly opposite a large park and children's playground, it's also located in a peaceful street of well-established homes with mature trees and gardens.
And with the convenience of the Southern Cross Early Childhood School and Scullin shops in the vicinity, as well as a bus stop nearby and easy access to Belconnen Town Centre, it's an enviable location that's priced to entice everyone from first home buyers to families or investors.
Features include:
Three spacious bedrooms Large living space Located opposite a reserve Tiled roof re-sealed Massive garage that can accommodate 4 cars Additional carport Large 786m2 block Low maintenance gardens Secure and private rear yard Close to local schools, shops and transport

The bathroom adjoins an internal laundry and there's a surplus of drying lines in the block's grassy rear yard.
Rented by the same family for 3 years at $300 per week, the tenants' departure has prompted the current owner to give another investor or owner-occupier an opportunity to reap the same rewards.
Buy for yourself now, then retain the ownership and rent to others later. Or purchase with the intention of the apartment becoming your family's passive income long into your retirement. It's an investment that may keep your loved ones forever Young.

residential.headline: SURPRISING SIZE - POSITION POSITIVE

Fronted by established trees and shrubs, the kerbside attraction of this four bedroom home is just a hint of what you can expect inside the front door.
Immaculately presented and in wonderful condition, the interior features neutral decor, timber flooring and a superb central kitchen that commands the run of the home - from the formal living and dining areas at the front to the east-facing bedrooms and even the glorious, light-filled family room at the rear which is lined by windows looking out to the gardens.
The master bedroom at the rear includes a spacious ensuite and an entrance wall of robes, while each of the family bedrooms remain in easy parental reach as they edge towards the front of the home. The entire property has been freshly painted both inside and out, plus Colorbond roofing was installed in 2012.
The private rear yard is terraced and remarkably long, currently including a paved area for BBQs or basketball practice and providing plenty of space for children or pets as well as an enormous expanse for gardeners and family cultivators. There's also a double garage with a similar sized workshop/storage area and off driveway parking for two more cars.
Located in an elevated loop street, even the position is excellent with community facilities such as child care and a preschool opposite as well as bus routes and shops within easy reach. Mount Rogers Reserve is only a few hundred metres away, too, if you're looking for exercise or pleasant walks.
This superb property is sure to appeal to discerning buyers looking for solid value and great fundamentals in a remarkably buoyant market.

rental.headline: Fully furnished two bedroom apartment
rental.description:
Nestled on one of Braddon's best streets, and only moments from the heart of the city's vibrant CBD, sits a wonderful opportunity.
A stately rich-red brick and chic rendered facade is only a hint at the welcoming interior that's hidden inside, where neutral tones, classy spacious rooms and a flowing floor plan ensures the flexibility to add your own panache and style.
The home's desirable open plan kitchen is fresh, fashionable, functional - whether your passion is haute cuisine with special friends or casual meals after work - and it's serving bench across to the dining area allows you to continue cooking without leaving the conversation.
Bright and inviting, the living room is the perfect place to relax after a busy day and enjoy the changing seasons outside - naturally warm in Winter and with Daikin reverse-cycle air-conditioning to keep you cool through the Summer. Glass sliding doors add to the interest by opening out to the fresh air of its sunny second-floor balcony where you can entertain friends or simply sit back and recharge your soul amongst the greenery.
The home's evening quarters sit privately along the western edge, featuring a master and queen-sized bedroom that both have built-in robes, each room discretely divided by a separate w/c, a laundry and a bathroom with its own corner bath.
With immaculate presentation and a location that's highly desirable, you can choose to indulge in its inner peace or celebrate life with Braddon's boutique shopping and cafe district on Lonsdale Street just a short stroll away.

Keep warm through the chilly winter weather with your choice of a wall mounted electric heater or take turns sharing stories whilst toasting your toes by the slow combustion fire in the living room.
The established rear garden offers the perfect setting for hosting family gatherings or simply watching your kids play safely all in the privacy and security of the fully fenced back yard.
Conveniently located close to a playing field and within a short drive to the heart of Belconnen, this property is sure to tick all the right boxes!

Stepping inside, you'll find a spacious living room that's ideal for greeting guests, with a door leading further back to the heart of the home where there's an open-plan family room, dining room and kitchen. The kitchen includes stainless steel appliances and has ample storage, as well as a window to the yard that takes in the north-easterly light. And when all's said and done and it's time to clean up, a brand new dishwasher is bound to help keep the universe at peace.
After-hours the bedrooms are inviting and functional, with the master bedroom and ensuite at the front of the house hovering nearby the fourth bedroom so that parents can keep an eye on small children or, alternatively, use it as a study. The second and third bedrooms are off the family room at the rear, separated from one another by the home's main bathroom and separate toilet. In-slab heating will keep everyone pleasantly warm throughout the winter months.
But if you think the interior sparkles, wait until you walk outside! The beautiful undercover courtyard offers a great place to sit back and relax while you watch your children play in the securely enclosed back yard and, when you do have to use your car, there's a double auto-garage with internal access.
Just a short walk from local schools and within easy reach of shops and parks, this is a home that's purpose-built for families but equally attractive for professional couples.
Don't miss out on the opportunity to make your family the STAR of this welcoming location.

• Double lock up garage with internal access

• Ducted gas heating/reverse cycle cooling/evaporative cooling
• In-slab floor heating

rental.headline: Perfect location
rental.description:
Conveniently located in the heart of Gungahlin sits this superb 2 bedroom apartment.
Enjoy the spacious kitchen offering stainless appliances, dishwasher, an abundance of cupboard and bench space overlooking the spacious open plan living area which flows beautifully out onto the large balcony where you can spend the evenings watching the sunset.
There is also an air-conditioning unit in the living area to keep you cool during summer.
Both of the bedrooms are very generous in size and have the added convenience of mirrored built-in-robes.
The modern bathroom is equipped with an oversized shower, in the European laundry you will find a dryer for your use as an added bonus.
The secure underground parking and storage completes this perfect package.
Features include:
2 bedrooms Stainless steel appliances Dishwasher Air-conditioning Dryer Built-in-robes to both bedrooms Secure underground parking space with storage area Lift access Disability friendly complex Private Balcony
**INSPECTION TIMES FOR THIS PROPERTY HAVE BEEN CANCELLED, APPOLOGIES FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE**

rental.headline: Refreshed And Ready
rental.description:
Contact our office today to arrange an inspection. Refurbished, refreshed and re-painted this cute, light-filled one bedroom flat is now ready for you.
Private and purpose-built, the self-contained flat is one side of a house, only sharing front and back yards with the adjoining flat.
The flat offers a refreshed kitchen with electric stove, plenty of storage and bench space, a large bedroom with built-in robe, sunny living room, separate laundry and bathroom and new window treatments throughout. There's a shared carport and designated shed for bikes or extra storage.
Located in a peaceful Page street, the location is superb. Belconnen's Westfield Mall, offices and bus interchange are all within walking distance and main transport routes to the City and beyond are easily accessed.
Features:
-Refreshed, light and sunny self-contained flat -Living room with leafy outlook -Kitchen with new bench tops, electric stove, new flooring, -Washing machine included -Large bedroom with built-in robes -Neat bathroom with shower -Generous tiled laundry -Own front door with new flyscreen door -Leafy back yard, perfect for relaxing -Shared double carport -Garden shed -Close to Belconnen town centre -Gardening services included** -Pets considered upon application
**Please talk to the property manager for further information.

rental.headline: Perfect Family Retreat
rental.description:
This Four bedroom ensuite home is set in the popular suburb of Hawker within a short, safe walk to Hawker Primary School, with a College and High School nearby. Located close to Hawker Shopping Plaza, medical facilities and playing fields.
Offering the perfect mix of living and entertaining space, you can choose to relax inside during those cold winter nights, enjoy a leisurely lunch by the pool or entertain friends and family under the sun shades in the back yard.
Glorious established gardens to the front and back are sure you to make you feel like you are in your own private oasis.
Features: Spacious separate lounge & dining rooms Built-in robes to all four bedrooms Ducted cooling Ducted gas heating Swimming pool Fireplace Delightful rear garden
$600 without pool cleaning services or $630 including pool cleaning services.
**Please register with our office should you wish to attend the viewing of this property on 02 6253 3333**

rental.headline: Furnished or Unfurnished You Decide!
rental.description:
Situated in the enviable 'Kingston Place", this immaculate one bedroom apartment is currently available either furnished or unfurnished.
Boasting a designer kitchen with stone bench tops and quality appliances including a Gaggenau oven, induction stove top and integrated dishwasher.
The open plan living and dining room flows effortlessly from the kitchen and has a stunning built-in entertainment unit. Opening out through floor to ceiling glass doors, the spacious 17m2 balcony is the ideal place to sit and relax or entertain friends and family.
The master bedroom has a walk in robe with custom drawers and shelving, dedicated study nook and modern ensuite with double vanity. You can also access the balcony from the bedroom.
Located within walking distance to Kingston shops and a short drive to Manuka and the city, this one will not last long.
Features: Beautiful one bedroom fully furnished apartment Modern kitchen with stone island bench Gaggenau oven Bosch integrated dishwasher Electrolux induction stove top Open plan living and dining Built in entertainment unit Huge master bedroom with access to balcony Custom walk in robe Ensuite with double vanity European style laundry Ducted reverse-cycle heating Spacious balcony Single secure parking space and storage
**Pease be advised that the scheduled open time for this property has been cancelled. Apologies for any inconvenience.**
Living: 72m2 Balcony:17m2
**ALL OPEN TIMES FOR THIS PROPETY HAVE NOW BEEN CANCELLED, APPOLOGIES FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE**

rental.headline: Experience the "Ambiente"
rental.description:
Enjoy the breathtaking views Unit 20 has to offer in Canberra's new up and coming suburb of Wright.
This well positioned one bedroom unit not only offers a generously sized bedroom with built-in-robes but also an open plan living area bathed in natural sunlight, new kitchen appointed with an induction cooktop, dishwasher and stone benches.
Be spoilt for choice when taking in the views of Telstra Tower with not only one but TWO balconies offering a the perfect place to sit back and relax after a long day.
The secure garage with internal access offers laundry facilities and leads to a downstairs courtyard.
With an easy commute to the major cities in Canberra, this property is well worth an inspection!
**Please note entrance can also be obtain from 65 John Gorton Drive **
Directions from Belconnen: Turn left onto Coulter Dr Go through 1st roundabout Slight right to stay on Coulter Dr Slight right onto William Hovell Dr Take the 1st left onto Coppins Crossing Rd (signs for Coppins Crossing Road) Continue onto John Gorton Dr Take Peter Cullen Way to Max Jacobs Ave in Wright Slight right towards Peter Cullen Way Continue onto Peter Cullen Way At the roundabout, take the 1st exit onto Max Jacobs Ave
Directions from Tuggeranong (City Bound): Travel along Tuggeranong Parkway Take the exit towards Weston Creek/Cotter Merge onto Cotter Rd Turn left to stay on Cotter Rd Turn right onto Max Jacobs Ave
If you are unable to locate the apartment please contact the property manager on 0424 141 841

rental.headline: Fabulous Family Home
rental.description: Stylish 3 bedroom family home close to schools, shops and public transport. This home features sundrenched living areas, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances/dishwasher, a spacious dining area which flows out onto a covered outdoor deck set in landscaped gardens. The ducted gas heating will keep you warm in the cooler months. Double lock up garage. 5 minutes to Gungahlin Shopping Centre.

rental.headline: New beginnings
rental.description:
Conveniently located within minutes of the heart of Gungahlin, sits this beautifully presented one bedroom apartment.
Offering so many of life's little luxuries, it won't be long before you're picturing yourself cooking up a storm in the spacious modern kitchen, kicking back enjoying the benefits of reverse cycle in the living area or entertaining family and friends in the private covered courtyard.
The spacious bedroom is fitted with a built-in robe and provides access to the small rear courtyard.
The beautifully appointed modern bathroom is equipped with an oversized shower plus there is an additional separate European laundry with a dryer as an added bonus.
Located close to Gungahlin Leisure centre, local shops and public transport.
Features - One bedroom apartment - Spacious modern kitchen with ample storage space and dishwasher - Reverse cycle air conditioner - Bathroom featuring an oversized shower - Private covered courtyard - Bamboo timber flooring - European laundry - One secure underground carpark with storage cage - Close to shops and transport
Pets will be considered upon application.

rental.headline: Great Beginnings
rental.description:
This delightful townhouse is located in a small, quiet complex in the popular inner Belconnen suburb of Cook.
Stepping inside you will find a spacious light and bright open plan living and dining room with timber look flooring. Just off the living and dining room is the sunny kitchen with a new stove and ample cupboard space.
The two bedrooms both feature built in robes. Just off the hall is the main bathroom with bath tub and separate shower.
The beautiful paved front courtyard is the ideal spot to sit and relax or to entertain family and friends. While the back courtyard is spacious and low maintenance with a ready-made vegetable garden waiting to be planted..
Within close proximity to Belconnen Town Centre, Jamison Plaza, University of Canberra, AIS and only a short drive to Canberra CBD.
Features: -Open plan living and dining room -Sunny kitchen with electric cooking -Two spacious bedrooms both with built in robes -Bathroom with bathtub and separate shower -Reverse cycle air conditioning and underfloor insulation -Spacious, private and easy to maintain front and rear courtyards -Single carport with additional lockup storage room

rental.headline: Beautiful Bruce - Close to the University of Canberra
rental.description:
This lovelythree bedroom townhouse is ideally located moments away from Belconnen Town Centre, University of Canberra and various cafes and restaurants.
As you walk in you will be greeted with the spacious sunlit living area, the oversized kitchen is equipped with an abundance of cupboards and bench space which opens out onto the dining room, from the dining room you will find a large glass sliding door which flawlessly flows out onto the balcony overlooking the beautiful back garden.
The main bedroom is generous in size with the added convenience of a two way bathroom plus there are built in robes to both of the additional bedrooms offering plenty of storage.
The bathroom will delight you with its lovely deep bath, separate shower and roomy vanity.
The property is available from early January 2015 for a 12 month lease.

rental.headline: 3 Bedroom Plus Study Home
rental.description:
Presenting this delightful brick home in the suburb of Melba, the property offers 3 bedrooms plus a study, in which 2 of the bedrooms include built-in wardrobes.
The house is garded with the shade and beauty of trees and shrubs, so it will make you feel right at home.
Located in very close proximity of the neighbourhood oval, primary schools, colleges, shops and bus stations, this property is in prime location.
Please register your interest with our office today.

features.otherFeatures: non smoking, close to parklands, close to schools, close to shops, close to transport

rental.headline: Sunny family home
rental.description:
Presenting this lovely three bedroom home featuring a lightfilled open plan lounge and dining room.
All bedrooms feature large built-in wardrobes, and the kitchen has been updated which provides you with plenty of bench and cupboard space.
There is a gas heater included in the lounge room as well as evaporative cooling throughout.
Out the back there is a fully enclosed rear garden inclusive of a large storage shed as well as a single lock up garage.
Situated close to sporting ovals, schools and the local supermarkets.
**Pets will be considered upon application**.

features.otherFeatures: non smoking, garden, close to parklands, close to schools, close to shops, close to transport

rental.headline: Idyllic Location
rental.description:
This three bedroom ensuite home is in an idyllic location at the end of a quite cul-se-sac.
Presenting beautiful established gardens with the added advantage of a regular gardener to do all the hard work for you.
The master bedroom features a full sized walk in wardrobe and ensuite bathroom. The master bedroom is also fitted with a reverse cycle air conditioner.
Boasting polished timber floor boards throughout the living room, you can enjoy the cooler months with gas heating to the lounge room.

rental.headline: Fully Fusnished Two Bedroom Ensuite Apartment
rental.description:
Offering space in abundance, this centrally located fully furnished two bedroom ensuite apartment is ideal for anyone wanting to be located in the heart of the inner south.
Inside you will find a generous open plan living and dining room that is filled with natural light from the large windows and the glass sliding door that leads out to the balcony. The kitchen is complete with stainless steel appliances including a built in microwave and a dishwasher.
The spacious master bedroom has its own ensuite bathroom; the second bedroom is also a good size and has built in wardrobes. The main bathroom offers a spa bath and separate shower as well as laundry facilities including a washing machine and dryer.
Outside you are only meters from the popular restaurants and cafes that Kingston has to offer, as well as a local supermarket and pharmacy.
Features: Fully furnished apartment Two bedrooms with built in robes Ensuite bathroom Main bathroom with spa bath Laundry with washing machine and dryer Open plan living and dining room Reverse cycle air conditioning Covered parking space Central location Pool and children's pool in the complex

rental.headline: Huge Family Home With Endless Options
rental.description:
Spoil your family this Christmas with an enormous four bedroom + study home ideal for entertaining even the largest of families!
Offering space and living areas in abundance you are blessed with a formal dining room, as well as a casual meals area, a formal living room AND a family room; this delightful home has room for every member of the family to enjoy.
The main bedroom features a large ensuite, huge walk in wardrobe and a study nook . Bedrooms two, three and four are all a good size and have built in robes. Bedroom five is the ideal home office or study with extensive built in storage.
Sited on an elevated block, the large balcony accessed from the living room and the dining areas enjoy mountain views and is the ideal place to relax and take in the scenery.
Down stairs is every man's dream with an oversized double garage and an additional workshop area ideal as a man cave or perfect for the home handyman. There is also secure parking for a trailer or boat along the side of the home behind decorative metal gates.
Outside the split level rear gardens offer plenty of space for the children to run and play as you entertain on the covered patio area.
With plenty of additional storage space and ducted gas heating to keep you warm during the winter months, this home is not to be missed.
Additional features include; Additional W/C Internal Laundry with storage space Double lock up garage Beautiful covered patio leading to the backyard Gardens with fruit trees Garden shed Study with bookshelf Main bathroom includes a spa bath
Situated in close proximity to a small shopping complex, sports grounds, and Karabar high school, this home is in the prime location and will not last long!
***Pets considered upon application***

features.otherFeatures: non smoking, balcony/patio/terrace, bath, formal lounge, garden, internal laundry

rental.headline: Tidy 1 bedroom apartment
rental.description:
If location, convenience, privacy and space are high on your list of desirable attributes, this genuine one-bedroom apartment deep in the heart of Macquarie could easily present the answer.
Sited just behind the local Macquarie shops and adjacent to the vast neighborhood oval, the Macquarie Childcare Centre and the Primary School, it's also within a short drive of the cafes, clothing stores and food outlets at Jamison Plaza as well as main thoroughfares to the city.
Unlike some other units in the complex, the home's bedroom door can be closed for additional discretion when friends visit and it also features a built-in robe as well as immediate access to the bathroom. I
n addition there's a balcony, an allocated car port and an internal laundry. Tidy, tantalising, terrific!
Features include: Genuine, discrete one bedroom sleeping quarters Balcony Allocated car port Internal laundry

rental.headline: Beautiful family home close to bushland
rental.description:
Presenting this fantastic 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom family home located very close to bush lands in the area of Watson.
Surrounded by delightful gardens, this home offers wonderful flexibility for family life.
Including an open plan living, dining and kitchen area, you can enjoy all the areas of living at once.
Features include: 6.5 Energy Rating Solar hot water Electric heating Large Single lock up garage Outstanding views Courtyard Modern kitchen Built in robes in all bedrooms

rental.headline: The Perfect Start
rental.description:
If location, convenience, privacy and space are high on your list of desirable attributes, this genuine one-bedroom duel-occupancy house in the quiet and sought after suburb of Scullin is what you need.
This property is furnished meaning you can move in and settle in straight away. The property has a backyard covered with the shade of trees and is also enclosed meaning ultimate privacy
Close to public transport, ovals and schools, this property is not one to be missed. Features include:
Bed, dining table, lounge, TV cabinet, TV, washing machine, kitchen ware and much more.
12 month lease preferred.

rental.headline: Fully furnished apartment!
rental.description:
Presenting this ground floor, 1 bedroom unit located in the Kingston Foreshore in the "Viridian" complex.
This property is fully furnished and equipped.
The property offers open plan living and is fitted with a gourmet kitchen. Including the added benefit of an extra large entertaining courtyard for relaxing, this property
Located in walking distance to restaurants and bars as well as outstanding views.
Features include: Study nook Reverse cycle air conditioning Underground parking spot

rental.headline: Country Charm
rental.description:
Presenting this great two/three bedroom property in an exceptional position where you can set up residence for peaceful living.
Sited on a lazy chicane adjacent to a large paved precinct , it's a home that you'll adore because of its peaceful oulook and be thrilled by its convenient access to local facilities.
Featuring a Federation style throughout you'll be delighted by it bull-nosed verandah and the charm of internal high ceilings as well as abundance of modern extras like stainless steel appliances, a two-way bathroom and a secure rear yard.
Features include:
2 bedrooms with built-in-robes Study or multi-purpose room High ceilings throughout Evaporative cooling Gas wall furnace Modern open plan kitchen/living that flows outside Stainless steel appliances Gas cook top Federation style home Secure pet and child friendly rear yard Abundance of natural light through living spaces Very large two way bathroom
*Pets will be considered upon application*

rental.headline: Stunning Villa with beautiful views
rental.description:
Enjoy the best of both worlds in this beautifully presented Villa, not only designed to showcase the finest in luxury living but also offering a host of additional features to underline its first-class appeal.
Positioned on nature's doorstep with views across the golf course, this luxurious four bedroom, ensuite home has a "wow" factor waiting at every turn - boasting a magnificent blend of formal and informal living areas. There's a stunning lounge and dining room leading off to the state-of-the-art kitchen brimming with quality appliances and many more amazing features.
Walking through the home you'll be mesmerised with the high level of inclusions such as floor to ceiling windows and high ceilings.
The bathrooms are simply delightful with an ensuite that includes features like slab heating, a spa bath and ample cupboard space.
Each of the bedrooms have built in wardrobes while the master bedroom provides an ultimate parental retreat from everyday cares.
Heading downstairs you will find the huge rumpus / theatre room which also includes a bathroom.
Moving outdoors you'll find a choice of peaceful areas to enjoy relaxed outdoor entertaining, whether your mood calls for a morning coffee on the deck while looking out to the mountains or you feel like entertaining your family on the elevated deck, then this property is for you.
Features include Solor Panels Ducted gas heating Evaporative cooling Abundance of storage space Lock up garage

rental.headline: Convenience and affordability!
rental.description:
Situated close to the local Kingston restaurants, cafes & the shopping precinct is this light filled and comfortable first floor apartment which is sure to tick all of the boxes.
Offering two generous sized bedrooms, both with built in mirrored wardorbes, a modern spacious kitchen and large living areas opening out onto private balconies.
A separate toilet for your convenience, spa bath to the bathroom and a single lock up garage are added features.

residential.headline: Impeccably finished and stylishly appointed
residential.description:
From the moment you enter this impressive residence you will notice the attention to detail and the quality of the construction that has been accomplished.
A clever floor plan allows for two separate living areas and achieves a blend of space and light.
The custom built Chef's kitchen with 30mm stone benches, has all the bells and whistles, including soft close drawers, walk-in pantry and stainless steel Bosch appliances.
Adjoining the kitchen is a spacious informal living room that incorporates a meals area and family room. This leads through a sliding door to a paved, pergola covered outdoor entertaining area.
All bedrooms are generous in size and the master bedroom is light and private with a spacious walk-in robe and features a large modern ensuite.
Built on one level with landscaped low maintenance easy care gardens and secure fencing the home is an easy stroll to the park at the end of the quiet and private loop street.
* 30mm Stone benches * Bosch 5 burner gas cook top * Bosch electric oven * Fisher & Paykel dishwasher * Walk-in pantry * Alarm system * Ducted vacuum * Ducted electric reverse cycle air conditioning * Separate toilet * Covered pergola with gas bayonette * Outside basin * Gas instant hot water * Tiled living areas * Quality carpets * Soft close drawers * Walk-in robe to master bedroom * Built-in wardrobes to the 3 other bedrooms * Panel lift remote control garage door * House floor size approx. 191.1m2 * Garage 38.9m2
No short cuts here - be sure to inspect this special home.
